comment_text: touch straight and clipped out to deep square leg - very short boundary that side, 60 yards at best
driven to long-on for a single
Kohli bowls a friendly full toss on the stumps, Finch made room by moving towards leg and smashed the ball through extra cover
a little width outside off and Finch waits in his crease and dabs to third man
pushed towards mid-on for a single
good length and straight, no width this time so Finch gets behind the line and defends towards the bowler
punched off the back foot towards wide mid-off, there's a direct hit at the bowler's end but the running was too swift
so the length is fuller outside off now and Finch moves forward and drives with power into the gap between cover and mid-off, the boundary is huge but the timing is good
short and wide outside off and Finch smashes it, smashes it off the front foot, with his back leg bent, and a full swing of his bat, lovely square cut
played off the back foot on the off side
Finch moves across to flick and gets an inside edge on to pad as the ball goes towards square leg, there was a small appeal for lbw from Praveen
Praveen strays down leg side, Finch misses the glance
Finch tries to cut one that's outside of and bottom-edges it into the ground
there's room to cut from Vinay and Finch does so, hitting the ball crisply towards third man
wide outside off again, this time the length is fuller so Finch square drives and opens the face to guide towards third man
short and wide outside off, Finch pounces, cutting the ball with power through point, poor ball
Vinay hits a good length, drawing Finch into the front-foot drive, and then nips the ball away from the right-hander, beating the bat
length ball with width outside off, Finch cuts to the fielder at point
pushed through, spins away outside off, punched to long-off. Fifty opening stand for Australia. Good platform to launch from
played off the back foot on the leg side
tossed up and spins in on off, patted to wide long-on
low full-toss on the leg stump, Finch jabs it with the bottom hand to the right of long-on
looks to pull from outside off, is a little early on it and ends up hitting it between the bowler and mid-on
another short ball, straighter, and Finch times this one perfectly, placing the pull behind square and it runs away to the famously short square boundary
a little fuller, angling away outside off, and Finch has a go at it without moving his feet, and ends up dragging it into the leg side. Was looking to smash that through cover
low full-toss on off stump and again Finch mis-controls a shot. Looked to go down the ground but the bat turned in his hand and he just beat short midwicket diving to his left
and he strikes first ball. It's a slower ball outside off, and Finch goes hard at it, looking to drive on the up, and pops a simple catch to short cover
When Finch hits, it stays hit. He greets Asela with a mighty six. Length ball on middle, clouted powerfully over midwicket
speared outside off, Finch eyes up the leg side with a slog-sweep and does not make contact. The ball grazes the pad and rolls away fine on the off side
back of a length and turns away outside off, chopped to point
dropped short on leg stump, Finch backs away and hammers it straight down the ground for a six, the first of the evening. Sailed towards the sightscreen
Finch backs away outside leg, dangled up wide outside off, skewed back to the bowler
Finch now attempts a big slog-sweep and does not make contact
Finch feigns to reverse cover-drive it through cover (for a left-hander) and does not connect
dropped shortish and outside off, slammed to long-off on the back foot. Sanjaya makes no mistake here, gets behind the ball

struck on the pad and given! The ball angled in had Finch's number all summer and Bumrah hasn't forgotten as that was full, nipping back in, striking Finch quite low and it's umpires call even as Finch reviews. Two in two for India and suddenly India's total isn't looking so bad
tossed up full on off, goes low and sweeps a single to long leg
Finch steps away outside leg, the bowler follows him, hit to long-on. 1000 runs for Finch in T20Is, he is the second fastest to the milestone behind Kohli
full on middle, Finch backs away outside leg, manufactures room, and drives firmly through the covers
length ball angled down the leg side and Finch gets a bit of pad on it down to square leg as he misses the flick
cut off the back foot through backward point
width offered outside off and this time Finch middles the cut, he doesn't beat cover point through
wider line, Finch goes for another cut but can't make proper contact
well bowled, Finch gives himself room and Sodhi cramps him with the googly. Cut to point
reaching for the ball, way outside off, and a one-bounce gather for the man at deep midwicket
slower bouncer, pulled behind square to Rashid
slower ball, pulled out to midwicket, and Finch drops his bat to deny himself a second run
incredible pick-up from Williamson, but just wide! A tip and run to the covers, Williamson released the ball almost before he had gathered it, and missed the stumps by a whisker!
banged in short, an attempted pull, can't connect, and the keeper's shy keeps the non-striker in his place
shapes to leg again, Plunkett follows him this time and it's a push to the off side
slotted into the stands! Finch hasn't given up the ghost yet ... makes room to leg, and launches over the covers!
wider line, cut through backward point
kaboomed over cow corner to complete a lone-hand fifty!. If only he'd had more of the strike ...
flicked off the hip out to deep midwicket
hoisted down the ground A very wide line, tempting Finch to reach for the ball but he connects impressively in the end
on the back foot, nudged to the leg side
wider line, hauled greedily down to wide long-on
down on one knee, and launched over cow corner! So much height, it challenges the floodlights, but plops safely over the rope
finds the gap at midwicket
on the legs, worked around the corner
tapped off the back foot close on the leg side for a quick single
Malinga slings it into the thigh of Finch, 131.3ks, he shuffles across and does not connect with a flick
back of a length on off, 134.3ks, Malinga has Finch hopping and skipping again. Punched down to mid-on for one
too full and straight, Finch stays on his crease and tees off, lifting the ball over midwicket and to the boundary
width outside off stump and Finch tries to blaze the ball through the off side, he gets a thick outside edge which carries the ball high over the head of the only slip catcher
Finch pushes with hard hands at a ball that pitches on a length outside off, hits it uppishly but bounces well short of the fielder at cover point
another non-turning short ball outside off, back-foot chop to point
backs away outside leg and biffs it to the covers
Finch steps away outside leg, the bowler follows him, chopped to cover
slower incutter, 94ks, bunted to the midwicket region
pretty full and angled in on off stump, Finch uses his wrists, picks the ball up in the air between wide mid-on and midwicket
full and angled in on off, flicked away to midwicket for one
overpitched on middle, drilled to mid-off. Finch chances a single and makes it. SL needed a direct hit to make it tight
108ks slower ball on off, the batsman backs away outside leg and jabs to mid-off. Sandakan, I think, tidies up
back of a length and angled in on middle, 126.1ks, clipped away to deep square leg
back of a length and slanted in, flicked to the deep with the angle
thigh-high full-toss, Finch does not need any second invitations. He goes over the top of short midwicket and beats mid-on to his right. Duly put away
Finch backs away outside the leg stump, this is a yorker on off stump. Finch manages to dig the ball out to cover
short and outside off, Finch stands up tall and punches the ball crisply, but can't beat extra cover
back of a length on off, 132.5ks, Finch jumps off the ground and fends the ball to short midwicket
outside off, clubbed out to cover, Finch is back off strike
back of a length, angling in. Finch looks to block it down the ground and gets an inside edge that runs away through square leg
massacred back over the bowler's head! Stays still at the crease and launches through the line. Moeen is getting some humpty now
overpitched and outside off, Finch drives with a slicing finish to point
full on off, Finch goes over the top again. Shovel-drives it with the bottom hand over mid-on
very full and veering down the leg side, past the glance. Leg-side wide from Sanjaya
leg-stump full-toss, clipped away to deep square leg
Finch goes inside-out. He backs away outside leg, collapses his back leg and lifts this length ball on leg stump over wide mid-off. One-bounce four
back of a length and outside off, stands tall and punches crisply to mid-off
back of a length and angled into the right-hander, he throws his bat at the ball and drags a thick, fat inside edge to deep midwicket
Finch makes room outside leg again, this is an off-stump yorker. Finch reaches out for the ball and manages to dig it out towards cover
What was that, Finch? He nearly swung himself off his feet. Length and wide outside off, past the tramline, Finch, having backed away outside leg, can't reach out and connect
length ball on off or just a shade outside off, Finch stays still, and hoists it over mid-on. Goes all the way though he did not middle it

Munaweera at short midwicket drops a sitter. Malinga covers his face up with his hands. Back of a length and sliding into the hips, this isn't a full-blooded flick from Finch. He simply lobs it in the air, Munaweera makes a royal mess of it. SL's fielding this series has been sloppy. Finch gets off the mark
back of a length and holds its line in the corridor, Finch stands up tall, punches and finds mid-off
shortish on off, 130.8ks, punchily played to mid-on
shortish and on off stump, dabbed defensively to cover again

back of a length and slung in at off stump, Malinga has Finch hopping. Fended straight to short cover. Klinger attempts a quick single. Finch yells "no". Klinger dishes out a full-length dive. The fielder didn't throw the stumps down in any case

No fireworks from Finch in front of his home fans. Sanjaya has his man. Good length ball, angled in and kicks up at the batsman again. Finch is early into the shot, looking to work to leg. He jumps off the ground, and ends up lobbing a return catch. This surface has something in it for the seamers
Finch has a wry smile. Length and outside off, it jumps from there, thuds into the splice of the bat. Hangs in the air before dropping in front of Mendis at cover
very full on middle, Finch backs away outside leg and drills to cover. More intent from Finch in this T20
shorter and ducks back in from outside off, some extra bounce too for Kulasekara. Finch jumps off the ground and punchily plays to the covers
very full and swerving in on middle and leg, a fierce whirl of the wrists sends the ball square of short fine leg. Skips away to the boundary. Wondering how Munaweera is feeling
short, turning legbreak outside off, he skips back and cuts it in the air between point and cover
slower ball, 118ks, on a length, middle and leg, Finch is caught deep in the crease trying to make room. Hence can't make the adjustment
short of a length, no room, not too straight, and all Finch can do is tap it back to BK

Finch can't clear the long boundary, Siriwardana pouches it at the edge of the long-off fence. Prasanna celebrates the wicket with a dab. Munaweera might be relieved, or has the damage been done already? Finch looks to loft this tossed-up legbreak over the fielder after backing away outside leg. No dice. Ends up slicing a catch
fired outside off, left alone
Dropped on 0 by Munaweera, Finch surges to a fifty off 30 balls. Tossed on off, Finch sizes it up and launches it high and over midwicket. Caught in the crowd. Don't watch the replay, Munaweera
short and angled into the hips, bunted to midwicket
Siriwardana finds a hint of turn, dabbed to cover
Finch steps away outside leg, this is short too and outside off, belted away to the left of Asela at long-off
Siriwardana drags his length back after seeing Finch step out. The batsman adjusts and nudges to midwicket
much slower through the air and spins away outside off, pushed to cover, can't get it past Shanaka there. A quiet over from Prasanna, just four off it
back of a length on middle, backs away outside leg and chops to sweeper
dropped short and breaks away outside off, leans back and cuts to backward point
full and into the pads again, flicked along the ground to deep midwicket
very full and straying into the leg stump, picked off to the left of square leg, no protection in the deep
short and wide outside off, goes back and chops it away behind square on the off side for one
Finch has nailed this, bringing the fifty stand. He moves away outside leg, lofts it inside-out with the turn over wide mid-off
lobbed up on middle and leg, Finch clears his front leg and swipes the ball away to deep midwicket

Finch presses forward and drives this full ball back to the bowler. Kulasekara collects the ball and has a shy at the stumps. Finch spins around and cops a blow on the back. He's okay, though, acknowledging the apology from Kulasekara, who was just aiming the stumps with Finch having strayed out of his crease
full toss, and battered into the stands at midwicket! Finch is on a roll now!
slightly back of a length and outside off, Finch chops to point
seams away from around off, pushed to point
short of a length and outside off, 132ks, Finch gently defends back to the bowler

Malinga tracks down this skier, running in from short fine leg. Slower offcutter from Asela, Finch swipes early and sends a top-edge in the air. Smart catch from Malinga. Two catches in two overs for him. SL slowing Australia down
back of a length offcutter, swiped in the air between deep square leg and deep midwicket

tossed up, a cuffed slog, and Jordan clings on brilliantly on the edge of the long-on rope! A solid base from a solid pair of hands, reached towards the rope with the ball coming over his shoulder and ends a brilliant captain's knock, and probably Australia's hopes too
right in the slot, and slapped hard down the ground
full and straight, and punched full and straight. Long-off swoops round to save the boundary, and that over has just restored a measure of calm to England's bowling effort
low full toss, effective in the circumstances. Long-off gathers
goes back and swats the ball to long on for a single
fires the ball down leg side, Finch misses the sweep
pushed to long off for a single
Finch backs away a long way outside leg, Yuvraj follows him, Finch hits the ball along the ground to long off
full length, shaping into the right-hander, punched along the ground to deep cover, and Finch just about makes it back for two
pounded mightily into the crowd once more! Down on one knee, unfurling his levers, and targetting the floodlights!

smashed back down the ground, and that isn't really a half-chance. It was full and he went for the straight punch and Abbott put his hands up to shield himself in his follow-through and got a little fingertip to it
back of a length on off and middle, blocked back to the bowler
back of a length outside off, moves away a touch and beats Finch as he chases at it with no footwork
short, and this hurried through just outside off. Finch looked to pull and got a bottom-edge on it, went over the off stump and bounced past the diving keeper through to the fine leg boundary
uppish but through the gap at the covers. Just short of a good length and swings away outside off, Finch is up on his tippy toes as he punches it away
makes slight room, punches this on the up, can't beat extra cover
veering onto the pads, 133ks, Finch misses the flick, the ball rolls away to short fine leg
back of a length and outside off, carved away in the air to the left of point and to the right of third man
full but leg side
full and leg side again, this time Finch gets a meaty flick on it and steers it away wide of short long leg
short of a length, tucked away off the hip for a single
big inswinger, beats the inside edge again, and is headed down leg again
gets the inswinger going this time, beats the inside edge, hits the pad, but this is headed down leg
and he has been crunched away for four first ball. This is a wide length ball, and Finch gets stuck into it
straight line and flicked out through square leg for a single
similar line, a touch fuller, Finch forward and blocks solidly inot the covers
good length just outside off, Finch plays at it from the crease and gets a thick edge right to wear slip would have been but Broad had taken the fielder out
full on off stump, forward and pressed up towards mid-on, they take on the fielder, Dernbach,  who shies at the stumps and hits Finch completing the run
similar length, perhaps a touch wider of off stump, this is pushed to extra cover on the back foot
just back of a length on off stump and Finch is onto it straight away to slam it over deep square leg, absolutely nailed, was probably a good length ball actually, that was creamed just rocking back
darted on middle and leg, Finch backs away and belts it back to Imad
Finch makes room again, Imad chases him with the indrifter and catches the pad

Finch steps away outside leg again, Imad hits the stumps and marks his return to international cricket. The length was short enough for the cut, but the ball drifts back in and finishes on middle. Can't chop it away from there. Finch does not touch it and Imad brings out his CR7 celebration. Welcome back, Imad
driven through covers for a single, Yuvraj has over-stepped, free-hit coming up.
length ball, angled in, too straight, Finch gets inside the line and twirls his wrists, sending the ball away to the right of deep square leg
uppish and this slashed away to the left of backward point.  Back of a length and outside off, cut away
short of a length, outside off, smashed to mid-off for one
looped up, into the toes, tucked to leg
full outside off, and a bit of outswing from Kaul. Maxi Finch looks to drive away from his body, but the ball whizzes past his outside edge
another legbreak, too short, and that is belted across the line. Bresnan, the man in the deep, flails hopefully, but can't intercept! Valuable blow
bouncer, Finch charges down the track, top-edges a pull, which plugs at deep square leg! it's all happening, but these runs are vital
cracking strike. Anticipating pace, and turned his stance inside-out to lift the ball Dilshan-style over fine leg!
and another slower ball, another mow across the line, and a scrambled single as the shy comes in
slower-ball bouncer, and Finch top-edges that straight into his face! Lucky he's got a lid on ... good ball
attempted yorker, tailing in from outside off, good delivery and even better fielding as Shahzad saves a certain four with a full-length dive at short third man
dot ball to finish. Not a bad recovery from KP in that over
cracked hard, up and over the covers. Excellent shot
a mow, but no contact
very wide, left alone, but it's just inside the tramlines
cracking delivery! A lifter on off stump, and beats the bat
belted! in the slot, and clean over mid-off!
very full length, dug out of the blockhole, fielded at mid-on
leg stump line again, backward square tidies up
on the toes, flicked very fine and they come back for the second
slow and wide, jabbed to third man
off-line from Pietersen and that is firmly swept behind square
waist-high full toss, clubbed out to midwicket, and they dash back for two. Bell's shy comes in on the bounce, which loses valuable seconds
proper spin from Pietersen as Finch advances
another bosh across the line, picks the gap well, as two men converge to save the boundary
smacked out to deep long on. Well played Finch, he's kept Australia afloat. England will need 148 to win. Exactly what they chased at Bridgetown in May, as it happens.
84kph, fuller leg break, he drives inside out to deep cover-point
leg break outside off, he gives room and cuts straight to backward point
launched inside out over cover! Wow,. He stays leg side to the tossed up leg break, opens the chest and launches it over cover
Slog sweep over midwicket! Similar length and line, he slog sweeps over deep midwicket
Finch should have been run out! He bunted this back towards mid on, Hasaranga darted across, gathered while sliding, turns and shies but misses! Finch gave up. He was miles out
slider 78kph, outside off, beats him as he tries to glide it fine
fuller outside off, he hangs back and square drives to deep point
slid through flatter wide of off, he gives room and cuts hard to deep point
94kph, length slower ball, he bunts this to midwicket where there is no one inside the circle, they sprint for two and get them as the man runs in. Superb running
launched over square leg! 50 for Finch in style! Fuller length on middle and he picks up the length and launches it over square leg into the stands
fuller on off, he gives room and miscues this down to long on
down the pitch, makes it into a full toss and swings it through midwicket
uses his feet then taps into the on side, looks for the second but it's not on
short delivery on leg stump, poor ball, Finch goes down on his back knee and sweeps fine of short fine leg

taken at deep midwicket and the mayhem is broken (for now, at least)! Looks to go over deep midwicket again, just gets too far underneath it this time, and had to reach a little, Mendis settles well under the catch
fuller length, Finch swings through the line again and finds cow corner, largely clubbed that
swings again and goes straight over the bowler's head, better timing on this and over the advertising hoarding it goes
slower ball again, and that is a precious maiden fifty for the 24-year-old Victorian, Aaron Finch. Bill Lawry would be doing handstands, no doubt
137kph, speared into middle, he works this wide of mid on for a single
driven down to the covers
wide and walloped, out to deep point
touch of air from Swann to the newbie and it's worked away for a single into the leg side
fullish ball is driven from well outside off to deep cover
slower ball on off stump, dabbed into the covers and they race a single
length on off stump, dabbed into the covers for another quick single
good length, 136kph and nipping away a touch as Finch fails to connect with a booming drive... Just inside the tramlines
touch shorter and closer to off stump, Finch hops back and blocks
pitched up, around the line of off, punched back down the track and Abbott sticks out a hand to field
Finch walks down the pitch and slightly towards the off side to whip the ball off his hips but he misses, that passed over leg stump
drifts slightly leg side but Finch gets a leading edge, loops short of mid-on and they scamper a single
short and clubbed away! Finch goes across his stumps and muscles the first boundary of the innings
banged in again, this time Finch flinches underneath it
hit on the pads, good pace, above 140 kays from de Lange, maybe a touch high and doing too much
length outside off, 143kph but Finch uses that to his advantage, just stuns a drive through extra cover for a couple
beaten outside off, this is up at 146kph, zips through in the channel as Finch sits back and wafts at it
fired down the leg side and this Jack-in-the-boxes up to hit de Kock on the finger tips and run away
just a fraction short and walloped, four more through square leg! Finch was so quick to seize on that, using the pace and flipping the ball over the infield for another boundary
pitched up and on-driven by Finch, lovely stroke but the ball races to mid-on
worked away for one more to end Swann's spell, which was ruined by Watson's assault in the first over
outside off, pushed out to deep cover
sharp delivery from Bresnan, hitting a length outside off stump and zipping past the outside edge
Bresnan corrects his length and line and it's driven very correctly to deep cover
heaved into the leg-side
and there's the elusive boundary, a well-judged sweep through backward square
waist-high full toss as Swann lets one slip with an aghast scream. But it's not costly
smacked down to deep cover
more sharp spin from an off-stump line. This is Test-match bowling from Swann
another flick, but straight to midwicket. England are keeping things tight now
turned off the toes to square leg
outside edge, poked through the gully region. That'll do
cripes. This is indescribably wide. Johnson-like. Full, quick and three miles outside off stump
that's more like it from Shahzad! Full and straight yorker is dug out
Yardy drops the catch! Chaos! Three fielders were after this as Finch got a leading edge that sailed up towards point, Yardy made good ground but spilled it
ooh dear, this was an awful shot. Full ball again and Finch had his head in the skies as he tries to slug this into the leg side. The best thing he did was was run a bye
excellent work from Bresnan, full outside off stump, Finch flays and misses
Bresnan starts unspectacularly with a full toss that is shoved down to midwicket for one
flat-footed hack across the line can only earn a single. Excellent over and an excellent spell
hint of width here means Finch can chop a cut shot away, but only for one
Yardy is back and starts with a typically quick flat delivery that's worked into the leg side for one
Finch is away now properly, skips down the wicket gets a touch of width and creams it wide of point for four
a dabbed cut to backward point and a direct hit. But the batsman is home
another yorker slower ball, he gives room, but jams a bottom edge behind square and they punch one
132kph, short and wide, he flays a cut shot hard forward of deep point! This was hit so hard! Magnificent striking. Poor bowling though
better line and Finch plays forward up on the off side
length ball, skids on a touch and nearly catches out Finch, who turns the ball softly to leg
banged in very short, veering towards the leg side again, Finch offers nothing and Rabada gets away with it
slides down the leg side - 145kph, fast but wayward
stays back in the crease and pats a shortish ball towards mid-on
back of a length and sprayed down the leg side - SA have already given up more extras than Australia
that's meat and drink for Finch, short and clubbed powerfully through backward square for his first boundary
Abbott feeds the beats again, half-track at the body and Finch muscles it away to the same part of the ground for another four
redirects his line, short of a length in the channel, punched into a gap at cover, through Parnell fields well to keep them to a single
oof, not so good, low full toss to Finch who bludgeons it to wide long-on in the manner of a man chopping down a tree
flatter, on the stumps, crunched back down the ground again, not the cleanest strike but it beats a rather feeble effort from long-on running across
flat again, straightening on the stumps, Finch backs away and chops into the off side
tight line, Finch covers his stumps in defence
full and straight and dealt with dismissively, Finch swivelling his bulk through a flat sweep to fine leg
four more, bullied through midwicket this time, played with the turn for the googly and smashed it past the man in the deep
on the stumps, worked to midwicket, can't get it through
skids on and tapped back to the on side
good length, fourth stump line, punched to cover
regulation legspinner from Tahir, bit of width and Finch slices a drives short of point, only half fielded
swinging a touch down the leg side, he misses the glance, definitely a wide
129kph, cracking pull shot! Fractionally too short and Finch pounces, he thumped this so hard through midwicket. It thumped into the rope
length ball, wide outside off, and he cuts this into the ground. Ball takes an awkward bounce as it's goes over point, but Rahul manages to get a hand to it, and slow the ball's pace down
misfield! From Rahul. Full ball outside off, and the square drive seems to go straight to point. But ball goes through him, and he's forced to give the ball a chase
full on middle, and he presses forward to defend. Ball rolls away to cover
length ball on middle, and worked off his hips to the leg side. Placed behind square, and the fielder at deep midwicket is too far away
length ball just outside off. Finch offers the bat's straight face to defend, and taps it back to Shankar

sliced in the air! And Dhawan completes the catch with a thigh-five to boot. Finch's poor run continues. Back of a length on off, and he looks to pull over midwicket, but the ball doesn't rise as much, and he lobs the catch to cover.
outside off, chopped to point, and Finch is off strike once more. He's faced barely a third of the balls in this innings so far
plants the front foot, and drags a massive flat six over cow corner. That's more like it
dabbed once more but straight to backward point
opens the face, and that's a cleverer shot from Finch, a deft nudge through third man, and it's a rapid outfield
tossed up and turns a touch as it hits the pad outside the line of off
makes room and squirts to backward point
punched off the back foot to long on for a single
sharp inswinger, good length, hits the pad, big appeal from Pant, but not much interest elsewhere, not out, going way down
good length outside off, mistimed drive runs slowly to mid off and they run an easy one as mid off is deep on the circle
good length, nipping back, hits him on the pad, big appeal, not out, outside the line, it runs to a vacant gully and they run a leg bye
125kph, beaten, good length nipping across, he prods forward and it goes past the edge, but it bounced short of Pant
127kph, good length outside off, he punches wide of mid off on the up, nicely timed, didn't overhit it, gets a couple
94kph, slower ball on off, he waits and waits and then mistimes it back to the bowler
gets down to sweep and the ball spins away from Rabada, who looks a bit dozy as he grabs thin air and the ball goes for four
short ball and again pulled dismissively through the leg side for a couple more
128kph, back of a length, outswing outside off, he pushes from the back foot to point
short and wide, he stands up and hammers it through cover-point! That sat up and asked to be hit
beaten, 130kph, back of a length shaping away, he waves at it with no footwork and is beaten
131kph, short and wide, he cuts in the air off a thick outside edge but safely and it flies to wide third man for one
play and miss driving on the up at a good length outswinger
cracked head high through point! He stood up with a vertical bat and smoked it through point at a catchable height but he picked the gap
beaten, 135kph, hint of shape away just passing off stump through to the keeper
thumped off the back foot through cover! Back of a length, he's punching this firmly through cover with supreme timing!
back of a length, 131kph. he's standing tall and defending firmly to mid on
130kph, good length, off stump, he's working this off the back foot to midwicket
133kph, back of a length, he punches off the back foot to cover, a misfield allows one
good length, nipping back, huge appeal for lbw but it's going way down leg
he charges and stays leg side, mistimes a full blooded drive to mid off
139kph, he heaves this through midwicket! It was a length ball, and he just smears it across the line, off a thick inside edge but it's timed well enough
thumped over midwicket one bounce four! Length ball in the arc, he cleared the front leg, hit this better but didn't nail it, but it still nearly went for six
fuller, on middle, he drives to Malinga at mid on and takes him on! The throw is just wide! He would have been out if it was a direct hit!
132kph, full and angled into leg, he clips this powerfully off the pads to deep square
little width outside off and guided backward of square to third man
slightly wide and there's an anguished cry from the bowler as Finch chops one more in front of square
drags the length back slightly, pushed into the covers and a quick single
shorter, goes to pull but was cramped up with Bresnan following Finch shuffling to leg, gets hit on the shoulder
quicker and this bounces a touch more, Finch pulls and the ball deflects down on to the pitch
swats this away through backward square leg for another single
shortish, outside off, sits in the crease and dabs one into the off side
length on middle and leg, 139kph but it stops in the pitch slightly, loops short of mid-on
well-directed short delivery, Finch rides the bounce and blocks short into the off side
back of a length slower ball on off stump, Finch stays inside it and guides it behind point for a single
or maybe not... short of a length and straying to leg from Rabada, Finch only needs to get some bat on it and the ball races to long leg for four
fuller and on the stumps, nudged through square on the leg side for a couple
length outside the line of off, tapped into the covers from the crease
slightly full and clubbed back, Rabada sticks out a hand but can't snag it, bounces short of Duminy at mid-off, whose throw is errant
full at the off stump and Finch swings it down the ground, lovely clean strike into the stands, dead straight
length delivery, stays back and runs one behind square on the off side
pushed back to the bowler
back of a length, punched standing tall to mid-off and they scamper one to bring the scores level
better length and Finch forced into blocking around the off stump
full on off stump and driven out to long-on who's gone back
just back of a length at the stumps, just blocked in the crease
full at the stumps, slower ball, picked up beautifully over midwicket, just a little clip and almost into the building site again
carrom ball and he pushes it to the off side
this was miscued! Tossed up by Ashwin and Finch gets on his knee looking to slog, gets the top edge behind the bowler, Kohli jogs from mid-on and takes the skier
now a half-volley on off stump, in the slot for Finch who clubs it over mid-on, bit of a whack but well timed

he's gone! Tahir has done the trick! This was tossed up and Finch goes for the slog sweep. Doesn't get good enough bat and this gains too much height towards deep midwicket. Miller's there and he clings on to an important catch
The arm-ball does the trick. Australia's top-three batsmen have all been bowled. This rushes on off the surface, snakes in, keeps low. Beats Finch's defences and raps middle
darted outside off, cuts and misses
slides on, turns a bit outside off, chopped to Amir at short third man
skiddy ball on middle, Finch inches forward and blocks it back
low full toss on off, bunted to long-on
slides on outside off, 94ks, forced through the covers
back of a length and slanting away outside off, skewed to leg off an inside edge
short on off, just below 140ks, punchily played to mid-on for one
back of a length and outside off, punched crisply to mid-off
short and outside off, 141ks, Finch uses the pace of Sami. Chopped hard into the ground, the ball bounces over backward point, and rolls away to the fence
short on the hips from over the wicket, Finch flaps a pull to short fine leg

back of a length and angled outside off, Finch stands tall and balanced as he punchily drives it through the covers. Umar chases hard, slides, snatches the ball, but fumbles a bit by the edge of the boundary. He recovers the ball with his right foot inside the ad skirting
length and just a shade outside off, Finch hacks it to the midwicket region, off the inside half
short and on middle and leg, pulled to the right of mid-on
back of a length, 144ks, Sami raps Finch high on the bat. Played in front of mid-on for a well-judged single
full and keeps going away with the angle from over the wicket, Finch gets a sighter. Ignored outside off
full and outside off, Finch eases forward and drives strongly to mid-off.
length on the legs, deflects to square leg
fullish on off stump, Finch still stays back and opens the face towards point. Quick single, well taken
that was the googly and it turned sharply too. Finch had no clue until it came at him. Keeps it out
shortish and on off stump, Finch goes back and defends with soft hands
short ball and he has dragged this from outside off to deep midwicket. Inspects the bottom of the bat as he jogs over for a couple. Didn't time it properly at all
good length ball just outside off, dabbed towards point
137 kph, full and just outside off, pushed down to mid-on
too much room on offer and Finch has laid into that. Thumped into the surface and it hares off to the point boundary. He'd better keep it full and straight if South Africa want to defend this
full on middle and leg, Finch flicks it away to deep midwicket

right through the man at point, it's AB who makes a meal of it! Shortish ball just outside off, Finch rides it and this seemed headed straight to point, but a bad bounce allows the ball to sneak through him
short and wide, they are not learning here. Finch loves that as he rocks back and slaps it behind point
full and outside off, drives to mid-off and Faf has to dive full-length to his right again. Almost a collision between the batsman as they ran through for the single
138kph, starts of with a short one angled across him. Finch was on the back foot and pulls. Doesn't get hold of it though

142kph, what a shot! It was short again and this time he has nailed it. There was a man posted to stop that very shot and he only had to move a couple of steps. Still this was so well hit that he had no chance
144kph, full and on off stump, Finch finds mid-on with a powerful drive
slower ball, dragged short and with some room outside off. Finch waits for it and flays it over backward point. Imran Tahir gets a workout at deep third man. How long until he comes on, d'you think?
that is a top shot! Drive on the up and through extra cover. Such balance from Finch. Just edged forward but he let his hands go and his timing is amazing
shortish on leg stump, Finch is cramped for room and nudges this towards midwicket
140kph, good length ball on middle, Finch pushes to mid-on, who is on the edge of the circle
quick and short on middle and leg and Finch pulls to deep square leg
moves way outside leg and the bowler serves up a full toss on off stump, bunted down to long-on
length just wide of off stump, but that is slammed hard into the square on the off side and it runs to the point boundary for Finch's first four

big shout and that is pretty much plumb. I think that was the googly, pitching on off and turning towards middle. Finch goes for a big sweep, he misses and the ball strikes him on the thigh, in line with middle and off. Simple decision for the umpire.
over the wicket to the right-hander, a length ball outside off, Finch drives firmly from his crease but can't beat cover
attempted reverse sweep, hit on the pad, an appeal, not out, hit outside the line of off
tossed up on leg, clipped straight to midwicket in the ring
wrong un, he sweeps but misses, big appeal from Rohit at slip but it was spinning well past off
tossed up, full toss, driven along the ground to long off
full toss, swept hard to deep backward square
132kph, angled into the pads, tucked through midwicket
132kph, good length, off stump, drives nicely to straight mid on and runs with the stroke
leg glance fine for four! This is full and swinging down leg and he glances this easily past fine leg who is inside the circle
129kph, good length, middle and leg, turned away on the front foot through square leg
good length, across him he drives and drags a thick inside edge through square leg
139kph, thick edge fine of third man, no slips in, Finch races back taking on the throw and dives and makes it easily as the throw is well wide
swing and a miss. Good length outside off, some extra bounce beats the edge as he drives on the up
good length, 142kph, thick inside edged runs wide of short fine leg and races away! That was a good delivery unrewarded
crunched straight of mid on! It was overpitched and he drives through the line, doesn't nail but hits it straight of mid on and beats the man
Dropped by Kohli at cover! He hammered this drive so hard on the up, Kohli was quite close and it burst through his hands and into his cap, and away for a single
129kph, punches off the back foot to mid off but mistimes completely and he's able to get an easy given it was hit so slowly to him
118kph, short ball, pulls with not great timing behind square and the sweeper has to run around and cut it off

caught at backward point! Brilliant from Kuldeep. He tossed up the wrong un, Finch advances and doesn't get to the pitch, swings hard against the spin, gets a thick outside edge that flies all the way to the man at backward point who takes an easy catch. Great bowling
a slightly slower one from Nehra to finish, Finch tries to dab it on the leg side but is hit on the thigh, he misjudged the pace. That's the first over without a boundary
nudged off the pads towards square leg to keep strike
shortish in length as he angles this in at him. Finch is on the back foot and whips behind square leg. Don't think there was bat involved though
he's nailed the drive again but can't beat mid-off this time, Bumrah has got away with two ordinary balls, still bowling length on this pitch
this was the bouncer, loopy bouncer rather, Finch swivels to pull but misses
looked a touch streaky at first, pitched up and it invites the lofted drive, just chipped over cover
skids through and hits his pads as he works it to the on side
drifts on the body and he shuffles and works it down to fine leg
134.2 kph, seemed quicker than that, he hops at the crease and steers it wide of point
chopped it on! Another flop for Finch, Sammy tucked him up for room, Finch was trying to cut, presumably, not the right shot for that ball, dragged it to the stumps
drags his length back and he was waiting for it, dabs towards point for a single
hoisted over extra cover and he collects the most casual six. Made room for himself and gave it direction, was all he did
flighted on middle, comes forward to block
slows it up again and this time he flights it, which fetches him a moral victory. Went on with the arm as well, and Finch gets an inside edge to the fine leg boundary
this was much slower, but his length isn't quite the best. Sat up for Finch who goes deep in his crease and bludgeons it through the covers
keeps out a fuller delivery angled at the stumps
flighted on middle, Finch sweeps to square leg. Hint of turn on offer for the left-arm spinner
goes back and punches the length ball, with no spin, down the ground to long-on
prefers to wait on the back foot as he turns it away to short fine leg. Warner calls it through for a single
flatter ball on middle, Finch goes back and picks it away to midwicket
fullish on off stump, walks down the pitch and clips it away through midwicket
119kph, slower outswinger, perfect length outside off, he defends on the front foot
length ball, angled in and moving in off the seam slightly, Finch drops that into the off side
short, straightening outside off, Finch hits that to long on
short on off stump, Finch steps away and heaves it over cover, what a shot, that's now the highest score in T20 internationals
steps across his stumps, dug out a full ball down to long-on
slower ball, 64mph, safe to say Finch read it, rocking back and hammered into the stands over square leg
full and on the stumps, smashed at and finds the crowd again, huge strike, nailed it, it went miles up but again enough length
full on the stumps, a massive hoike into midwicket, finds a gap and gets two
full on off stump, dabbed down the ground Broad can't field it, long-on rushes in and saves two
top edged pull, has it found long leg, no! There's the century, what an innings from Aaron Finch, just 47 balls for the century, the first T20 international ton in Britain
full length on off stump, dabbed towards point but no single available
cutter outside off, back foot drives comes off the outside off and finds short third man, no chance of a single so Finch doesn't even tie the record
length on the stumps, flicked to short long leg for just one so no record for Finch
full length just outside off, pushed to deep cover
slower ball just outside off, Finch drops it behind point and jogs a single
full on off stump, forward and playing through cover for a single
closer to off stump this time and Finch bottom edges the cut into the ground through to Dhoni, who doesn't collect cleanly
backs away far outside leg to hit through the off side but mis-times to the bowler

terrific catch from Nasir, who inspects his right wrist to check for damage. Leg cutter dupes him as Finch backs away and looks to flay this over the covers. Gets more of an edge which soars into the evening sky. Deep point races in, keeps his eyes on the ball all the way through and pouches it safely despite it swirling a little away from him at the last minute
dart outside off stump, cut away to deep point
fuller just outside off, swung into the on side and finds midwicket on the bounce
short and wide and Finch slaps it to the man at cover. Lucky escape there
just back of a length, dabbed in front of point for a single
dragged down and heaved over the leg side, Morgan dives back at deep midwicket but there's enough carry to get that for six more

Nehra loses his line, spraying it wide outside off from over the wicket, Finch reaches for it and unleashes a mighty cut, the ball was so far outside off that it connected with the toe of the bat but still raced through point
smashed down the ground! Tsotsobe bowls a half volley outside off, Finch gets down and drills it wide of mid-off

swats across the line, top-edged and the ball loops tamely to mid-on! England have slain the beast! Everyone was expecting him to go after the bowlers again and Finch is always going to live and die by the sword. Although it was more like the pen knife this time... Maybe not quite short enough to pull and Broad gets him
pitched up outside off, not a half-volley but hit cleanly on the up over mid-off for four
touch short of a length, angling back in off the pitch, prodded back on the off side for another single
Finn pummels the ball into the pitch short and fast and it climbs past Finch's nose as he swings and misses
Behardien misjudges it at deep square leg, it was a length ball that was pulled, Behardian ran to his right and over ran it but managed to stop it before going to the rope
slightly back of a length, works off the pad and it roll behind square, no bat involved
Abbott nearly got that one to sneak through, he was back at the crease and the ball skidded and hit the top of the pad
Finch made room and Abbott followed him and cramped him up, he could only push it to the off side
Amla's done something right! Finch makes room and looks to chip that over the on side, miscues it to midwicket where Amla backpedals and takes it

slower ball, Finch backs to leg, swings square and drags it onto middle stump ending a truly spectacular innings. That was a marvellous display of hitting and he falls trying to swing away another but got off balance going towards square leg and the change of pace deceived him
full just outside off, Finch slugs it down the ground and boo! Only four, muscled away
full, very full, dug out down the ground to long-on
another full toss, this outside off stump, Finch, times the pants off it again and pummels it into the seats over midwicket, that's now the most number of sixes in a international T20
low full toss, Finch backed away and finds extra cover, a dot!
down the track and this time Morgan watches it sail over his head, huge, lovely timing
full and slapped over the bowler's head to bring up the 200
pitches outside off stump and straightens, Finch walks across the stumps and turns that to leg
look out over extra cover! Plantede his front leg outside leg and hammered this over the top, that's the second time he's nailed that shot today
short ball, slammed to the cover boundary. Made room outside leg and he's muscled this away. No need to keep it down
a bit too much air on this one, also too much room. Finch gets down on one-knee and cart him over midwicket.
bowls slower to Finch, who is a little more tentative facing him. Presses forward to flick against the turn  and gets hit on the pad
flights it up on middle, Finch waits on it on the front foot and pushes into the covers. Easy single with the man on the edge of the circle
full and outside off, Finch drills it to mid-off who is on the edge of the circle

137kph, goes fuller and Finch is stuck in his crease. Blocks and gets it off the bottom of the bat. Warner wants a quick single. Taskin runs forward to field it himself but sends a wild through to long-on
a shorter ball outside off, Finch misses out on the cut again. This time it had enough room to be clattered to the boundary. Should consider himself lucky
extracts a bit more bounce off this deck. Nips back in and beats Finch's cut shot. Big appeal from both the captain and the bowler, but the umpire is unmoved
that is so wide outside leg stump, Dhoni has no chance, and short fine leg can't stop it either! Five extras to the total
clipped off the pads behind square for a single. Ashwin has been dismantled in that over
nothing is going India's way! Finch jumped back to flick but got a leading edge that lobbed over midwicket, Raina was walking in but then had to stop and rush back ... he could not get to it in time
good length outside off, Finch stays in his crease and plays the ball to point
slapped through the covers as this is full and outside off
short again, this time on middle, and Finch pulls to deep midwicket
135kph, shortish and just outside off, Finch doesn't have enough room to cut and is beaten
shortish again, short-arm pulled into the leg side into a gap on the infield
angled across, play and miss on the drive

what a catch! Kulasekara's fine run continues. Finch moved across his stumps and tried to hit that through the leg side, but got a thick leading edge and Kushal Perera at short cover dived well in the air to his right to take a super catch.
darts one in on middle and leg, Finch goes back and blocks
shortish, but this is quicker. So Finch punches it behind point, along the ground

Mushi's certain that was out, he's bewildered at the umpire's decision to rule this not out. And yep, there was a giant edge. This was flatter on off stump and he went back to cut. This almost goes off the face and was well taken by the keeper. Umpire Dharmasena was staunchly shaking his head
flicked through square leg and they run hard to come back for the second
top-edge but it falls in no-man's land. There was long-on and deep midwicket and he backed himself to bisect them. Instead he bisects short third man and short fine leg
flighted just outside off and he drills it to mid-off
stray once, you're naive. Stray twice, you're asking for trouble. Finch rocked back and cuts the short ball to the right of point. Strong stroke
stays back despite a bit of flight on this, pushed into the covers
stays beside this fuller delivery and slaps it to deep point
smashed back down the ground. That was sheer power! Full and straight went JP, but Finch opened up his stance and flat-batted this with murderous intent. No chance for long-on
short on off stump, he backs away and slaps it to deep cover
143kph, fuller ball outside off, pushed down to long-off
fuller delivery slides down leg, and the umpire calls him on it
length ball outside off, Finch slogs it to the deep midwicket boundary. In the arc out of the park stuff now
low full toss outside off, Finch drills this through the covers to raise his second fifty of the tournament. This seems to be a match-winning one
this one straightens outside off and Finch gets a thick outside edge to third man to raise the Australian hundred
good length ball, angled in on off stump. Pushed to long-on. They wanted a couple, but it wasn't really there
opens the face and carves this behind point
short ball, with room outside off again. Rocks back and pulls to thump it to the midwicket boundary
massive! Finch moves outside leg and comes forward to slam a full ball far over the long-on boundary, that was hit beautifully
this one isn't as beautiful but it's good enough to beat the leaping fielder on the edge of the long-on boundary! Finch gave it everything again, but did not connect as well as the previous one
what is with this line? Extremely wide down leg again, this time Dhoni was wise enough to move early
129kph, good length, holds up a touch, he's back and punching to cover with no timing
129kph, good length, wide of off, he drives off the stickers of the bat to cover in the ring
back of a length, 138kph, on off, he knocks this to the gap at midwicket
darts into the right-hander, and Finch, who doesn't really move his feet, is struck on the thigh as he tries to find a single behind square leg
good length ball, darting down the leg side. Finch aims a flick, but can't connect. Would've been a great ball to Warner, who is at the other end, and who has been struggling against Bhuvi this tour

goes wide of the crease to bowl the outswinger, but Finch is able to time is well enough, through cover point. Pandey chases it down, relays it to Kohli, who sends the throw in to Dhoni, who collects it to the right of the stumps, and flicks it between his legs onto the target. Warner is safe though
too short and Finch simply helps it on its way to the backward square leg boundary. Fine shot, swivelling on his back leg
pitches it up further, and Finch, rooted to the crease because of that better length, defends off the inside edge
on the stumps, driven into the infield
full on off stump, drives to mid-on
on the stumps and defended back to the bowler
shortish delivery outside off, defends. And as Bhuvneshwar walks back, he drags his feet over the area where he lands on the popping crease, quite vigorously
pitched wider from Jadeja, Finch frees his arms and hits it to long off
back of a length and outside off, blocks it
taken by Kohli at cover again! Short ball, outside off, slapped straight to the fielder. Finch possibly undone by a little more lift off the pitch than he budgeted for.
what a shot. Finch makes room , and that's another boundary. Full and on the stumps, carved powerfully over cover for four
closer into the stumps, that length ball is pulled away aerially towards deep mid wicket, where it drops well safe
Finch is playing some innings here, but that's poor bowling as well. Kohli strays a length ball onto the pads, Finch swivels, gets it past short fine leg and to the fence
backs away and drives a full ball down the ground
length ball straightening on off stump, turned into the legside again and it's collected at wide long on
fullish and on the stumps, driven hard wide of long on
shortish, outside off stump, cut away to the square sweeper on the off side
gets away with the free hit
length ball on the stumps, batsman bludgeons that to long on. Oh and an overthrow gives an extra run.
closer into the body, Finch chops down on it, no run
full and on the stumps, driven along the ground to long on
slower ball, full toss outside off stump, driven nicely past a diving mid off for four
short ball close into the stumps, Finch misses with a cut
shortish and wide, and Finch absolutely lays into this, backing away to loft it over deep cover for six
short, fast and wide, Finch makes room again and misses, temporarily losing his balance
full toss on the legs, driven along the ground to wide long on
shortish and wide, cut away to the fielder but there's enough time for one
fullish on the stumps, this is turned away into the leg side, and the batsmen take two
backs away slightly and tries to hit that one through the off side, but can't beat the field
backs away again, but Jadeja follows him and yorks him, preventing a big shot
full and flat outside off stump, driven aerially to long on
shorter this time, still wide. Cut away to the square sweeper again, on the off side
and he's immediately punished. Goes well wide of leg stump from around the wicket, Finch helps it on its way past fine leg
way wide down the leg side, not even Dhoni can collect
muscled over long-on. That's sweet, sweet power
eased out to midwicket

a filthy beamer, and a brilliant catch, but it won't count! Slammed out to wide long-on, where the ball is hauled in by Chapman with an excellent relay take, tossing the ball up in mid-air as he clambered back into play

another boundary off a misfield, almost identical, but Ashwin is the culprit this time. Short, but not as wide as the last delivery, Finch plays it late and Ashwin can't collect at short third man. Slips through for four
short of a length on off stump, cut away again, but this time third man comes around to collect
fullish ball pushed into the offside infield
that's a quick round-arm dart from around the wicket, hits the pad but that was missing leg
played back to the bowler, sharp fielding again to limit Australia to just the single in the over
slides this onto the pads, goes to flick to leg it comes off the pad to short third man
step to leg and cuts a length ball on the stumps hard through point, long chase for Lumb from deep cover and he doesn't get there
what a shot, takes a length ball two feet wide of off stump and lifts it over cover for six, absolutely nailed it, but Finch fell over towards the leg side, remarkable stroke
slower ball, 71mph, very full on the stumps, flicked straight to midwicket
short and wide, the cut stroke is slightly mistimed and Dernbach gets away with it as Finn dives and saves four with a full-length dive at short third man
slower ball, 76mph, spotted and slugged off the stumps over square leg into the crowd, got the timing spot on there, big strike
gives himself room by stepping to leg, Finn fires in a full ball on leg stump, Finch drives it to mid-off without timing
back of a length just outside off, a much better line, blocked back to the bowler
full delivery on the stumps, a huge heave across the line, reasonable connection and gets it pretty square, Root in the game again, slides and saves four
length on middle and leg, clipped out through square leg but Root on the rope does well and saves two
length on the stumps, tucked backward of square, Michael Lumb has to chase round from deep square, saves four with a slide but they run well for three
very full on off stump, too full to try and slug it over the top, drives this firmly up towards mid-off
better length and a decent line on middle and off, forward comes Finch to dab it towards midwicket who dives and saves the single before mid-on gets the chance to do so
slower ball on the stumps, spotted and flicked over the on-side, times this well again and gets it on the bounce to the midwicket fence
goes again, this time with an uglier slog, doesn't time this at all and rolls it towards mid-on
goes back and places the ball in front of square leg for one more
short of a length and that's some placement! Finch muscles that ball onto the leg side, and long on and midwicket almost bump into each other on the fence as it dissects them perfectly
step to leg again, another cut off the stumps, straight to the sweeper this time
slower ball, spotted outside off and smashed down the ground, superb strike and goes to fifty with a great stroke, what a knock this is
low full toss on the stumps, Finch drives it to long on
full on the stumps, hit through the off side for a single
full on the stumps and Finch has played that inside-out shot so well today. Gets low, and carves it over cover again, right in between the two fielders
and a poor ball follows. Full toss on the pads, Finch launches that straight-ish on the leg side. Splits long on and midwicket again
full on the pads, driven to long on
short of a length, and a little wide. Finch is just preying on anything even slightly off line. Cuts that powerfully, cover sweeper runs around and dives, but can only help it onto the boundary
length outside off stump, driven to that deep cover man again, who does enough to prevent two
slower ball, fullish on off stump, Finch has a big swing, but mistimes it. Goes along the ground to wide mid on

he's got him. Can you believe it's off a knee-high full toss? That's floated up to Finch, who misjudges the pace, and is too early on the shot. He gets an under-edge and hits it straight back to the bowler, who seems to hurt his finger as he holds on. End of a very good innings.
another low full toss, pushed down the ground, long-on slides around and should save this easily but he slides almost past the ball and allows it to slip past him for four, ruins a much better over
Ashwin returns and once again bowls outside leg stump from around the wicket
touch shorter, waited for and cut from off stump, Luke Wright dives and saves very well at backward point
edged and caught behind! Good length outside off, pretty wide, no swing, Finch reached out to drive, just nibbled away a touch, he edged through to Pant who took a simple catch!
steps to leg again, carves a full ball from the stumps to long-off
a superb punchy drive off the back foot, Ashwin dropped short and drifted across the right-hander, Finch went back and towards leg to make room and hit the ball hard through covers
full and slides into the pads, cry for lbw but it was going down leg as Finch tried to flick to leg
steps away to leg now and whacks it over extra cover, middled again
good length on the stumps, blocked from the stumps back to the bowler
short, wide and struck powerfully past a diving backward point to the boundary.
fullish on off stump, driven to long on.
full and way down the leg side
forward and flicking through square leg, they run hard and get two
length ball on the stumps, Finch back and pushes to extra cover, a dot ball! The crowd cheer
tucks up the right-hander with a good length ball, Finch defuses it down the ground to mid-on
strikes this time! Back of a length, this doesn't bounce much, Finch swings to the leg side and his castled
back of a length at off stump, a rare dot ball

dropped! And another mess-up in the field for South Africa. Three fielders converging and none of them really wanted it. Phehlukwayo the man who ended up dropping it. Finch was followed by a short-of-a-length delivery, sent it very high into midwicket. David Miller, running in off the boundary, may have had a better chance
short of a length, into the pads, drops down by his feet and Lynn calls him through
comes down the pitch, it's back of a length, he does well to whip this off his pads behind square
back of a length at off stump, 143kph, worked out to deep midwicket
leg side, goes for the sweep and misses
slower ball, outside off, Finch is fooled as he thinks this is ripe to loft over cover. In the end, he finds a couple at deep midwicket
full on middle, Finch clips it smartly behind square leg.
step to leg, tries to swing it over the leg side, off the toe of the bat and flat on the bounce to long-on
forward just outside off stump, gets a thin snick and it races past short third man and whistles for four more!
places it neatly through the gap at midwicket for a couple. Finch going at a higher strike-rate, playing proper shots than his partner
floats it up in the batsman's half and Finch takes full toll. An off drive of the highest quality. All along the ground. No chance for the fielder, moving to his right from mid-off
now he goes along the ground, and picks the gap between points backward and orthodox. Gorgeous cut shot
taps a fuller delivery on middle past Rohit's right at short midwicket
lifts it over point, considering the ring there is congested with infielders. The knuckle ball, lashed to the boundary
back and plays off middle and off to the cover sweeper
wide of the crease, 139kph, angled to middle, he clips this nicely with the angle wide of mid on for a couple
136kph, good length, he tried to turn to leg but got a leading edge that falls safely close on the off side
leans into a fine-looking drive, but mid-off is there to play party pooper
punches towards cover

width - so much that Finch has to reach out to meet it and even then he makes contact with only the bottom of the bat. Still enough strength in the shot to send the ball scurrying to the cover boundary
this is biiiiiig! Goes down on one-knee and smacks this way into the crowd behind midwicket. One-handed  catch in the crowd as this slog sweep epitomises Finch's power
stays on the back foot despite a bit of flight on off stump, pushed down to mid-on
flatter ball on off stump, he rocks back and pulls to the square leg boundary
gets a thick outside edge as he was looking to nudge the good length ball towards midwicket
slip was removed after that boundary, and predictably out comes the outside edge. Wouldn't have mattered though because the ball wanders out well wide of that position to third man
good length ball, turning just a touch on middle. Defended off the back foot
stays in his crease and pushes at the ball, shorter length this time and the outside edge goes down to third man
blocks into the covers to retain strike
nice and tight on middle, Finch clips it to midwicket

forceful shot down the ground, going for the shot simply because of the ball being outside off.  But it is not a half-volley and it thuds into the bat, making it twist in Finch's hand, and as a result the ball only just clears mid-on
good length angling into Finch, who closes the face of his bat to turn the ball towards wide mid-on for a single
pushes down the ground
short and outside off, cuts to point

oopsy, Afridi dives a little lazily and Finch treats himself to a one-handed boundary. Even he stares at it with a little bit of surprise. It was full on middle and off stump, Finch was into the flick a little too early and checked his shot. But the timing he mustered was quite staggering
back of a length and outside off at 148 kph, Finch looks to punch through the covers and is beaten soundly
146 kph, jumps back in his crease to try an pull a delivery that is not quite short enough. Mistimes it to square leg
slides on with the arm from around the wicket, Finch cuts off the back foot and Bumrah makes an awkward stop as the ball spins away from him at point
another huge strike, straight down the ground this time, and almighty smack, it went a long way up and cleared the straight rope easily
stays around the wicket, full on the stumps, swung down the ground, has he got enough of this, yep, six more
flat and short, Finch goes back and hits the ball to long on
hit through midwicket from outside leg stump for a single
first ball pitches on a length and is on the stumps, on target straight away. Defended by the batsman.
slightly straighter this time, Finch pushes it to the on side, but there's no run
hint of swing, but that one is wide and full and Finch launches that one over mid on and there's no stopping that one
length on the stumps again, Finch pushes it to the now-vacant mid on and takes an easy single
length ball on off stump, defended into the off side
neither spin or seam working here. Finch backs away, gets far enough from the length ball and cuts it in the gap behind square for four
another back-away, but this time the ball is fuller and he hits this one through cover
makes room again, but Ashwin goes closer to the batsman and he hits it straight to cover
mayhem early on here. Finch hasn't backed away this time, and Ashwin bowls it full and wide. Batsman gets low and carves it over cover-point and it almost gets to the fence on the full
length ball on the stumps, Finch moves across and clips it into a gap on the legside
legside again, full and on the pads, but Finch finds the fine-leg fielder with his flick
pushed off the front foot to long off for a single
steps to leg but sees it off the stumps and thwacks it into the stands, flat and hard, massive strike, right off the meat
steps to leg and this time drives through the off side, nails it and finds the gap past extra cover

goes for a sweep, but he hasn't controlled it properly. "Catch it," everyone cries and Mohammad Irfan at short fine leg does not disappoint. Dubai is up and buzzing. A top edge removes the Australia captain
that's lovely. Slants a good length ball across Finch and gets a little nip away to help himself. Beats Finch a second time in the over
rocks back and cuts a shortish delivery through cover
tosses it up, and Finch goes for the lap sweep, but is struck on the front pad. Impact outside off stump so Kuldeep wastes an appeal
another sweep, but this ball, being on leg stump, is better to be put away by that shot. Single to deep square leg
good length ball on middle, Finch sweeps to long leg
four balls played, four sweeps used in the battle of Finch v Kuldeep. Single to deep square leg
slow through the air, and he keeps it outside off. Finch, backing away, goes for the cut, but that premeditated movement ruins his timing because it took him too far away from the ball

smokes it over deep midwicket. A slog sweep with all the power in the world. Chahal sets up the shot, though, by tossing the ball up and outside off. He's so far bowled flatter and outside off, hoping to deny batsmen the chance to get under the ball
slightly back of a length, angling in with the arm, Finch closes the face and tucks a couple into a gap in front of square
flat-bats a short ball to long-off
skids straight on as he pitches a quick, good length ball on leg stump and it goes further down into Dhoni's gloves

another slider - and it's pitched perfect - on a good length on middle stump. Finch is backing away, but to his credit  he meets the ball with a straight bat and as a result finds a single to long-off. Good batting.
the sweeps seems to be the only shot he wants to play against the wristspinners. Yanks a full delivery outside off to deep square leg

bowled im! This is splendid bowling from Kuldeep. He's assessed that Finch has decided it will be sweep or nothing tonight against spin and loads up for the shot again. But this ball is a too full. it's too close. It demands a straight bat but by the time the alarm bells ring in Finch's head, he sees red behind him. The other thing Kuldeep did well is bowl it quicker so the batsman didn't have the time to adjust
goes for another pull as he misjudges the length again. Irfan gets the ball to lift up off just back of a length and this one thuds into Finch's stomach. Gets an earful from Irfan
pull again, his front leg comes off the turf to help him control it. Kept down to deep square leg
tossed up on off stump, Finch is forward to block solidly
fired it in a decent clip. Finch goes back and tries to cut, but this ball has skid on into the keeper's gloves. Didn't miss the leg stump by much either
nudges a good length ball to midwicket
length ball on middle and off, Finch turns the ball off his front pad to midwicket
excellent line, straightening slightly in the channel outside off, Finch presses forwards, gets an inside edge on to pad
on the stumps, pushed towards mid-on for a single
Afridi hits a hard length and gets the ball to angle away outside off, Finch hops and jams to cover
just short of a good length on leg stump, and Finch swats it away like a fly to deep square leg. Just a single, though
banged in on middle, chest-hunting ball, cramps Finch for room, beats him for pace, and draws a top edge that swirls away from the keeper running back

Pakistan's fielding has been horrid this morning. Misfield at mid-on. Sarfraz is peeved. Back of a length and outside off, heaved across the line to mid-on, where Nawaz takes his eyes off the ball and earns the wrath of Sarfraz
back of a length and holds its line on off stump, Finch lines it up and successfully clubs it away wide of deep square leg. How's Shoaib Malik feeling?
back of a length, angling in at off stump, then seaming away outside off, Finch nearly swings himself off his feet as he looks to club it over the midwicket boundary. Beaten lavishly in the end
Finch forays down the track, Afridi drags his length back and targets the body of the batsman. Top-edges it over fine leg's head for six
Ashraf hits a hard length on middle - neither cuttable nor pullable - dragged away to the leg side for one
back of a length and outside off, Finch taps it wide of point for a single
on a length and angling across off, forced off the back foot to the covers
back of a length and slanting away outside off with the angle from over the stumps, Finch gets on top of the ball and laces it away to the right of deep third man
short and cramps Finch for room, fended off the body to the leg side

banged in short and outside off , Finch is rushed into a hook and hence top-edges it in the air over the leg side. Two men converge as the ball swirls away in the air. Malik and Amir are the fielders. It would have been a simpler catch for Amir, but Malik eventually lunges out for the ball and drops it. Finch dropped first ball in the final. What a play in Harare! How much will it cost Pakistan?
length ball drifting down leg, and Finch has no problem in flicking it fine past the keeper's left. The ball runs away to the fine-leg boundary in no time
on a length and outside off, flashed to the covers
on a length and angling away outside off, Finch has a crack at it. And shovels in the air past the right of midwicket. The bottom hand doing all the work to generate strength

Finch ventures outside leg, Afridi chases him with a full dart, which is glanced away to short fine leg. The two batsmen risk a single. Short scoots off and slides his bat in. Even a direct hit might not have been enough
good length and slides in at off, defended back. "Very well bowled," says Sarfraz from behind the stumps
Welcome back Nehra. Four first ball. Gentle, short, on the pads, and short-armed away past square leg
full outside off, and once again allowing Finch to open his shoulders. Offers the bat's full follow through and lifts it over extra cover for a monster hit
bouncer on off, but Finch simply rolls his gloves over this pull shot. Plays it along the ground to the outfielder in the deep

Finally Pakistan have caught one! Finch backs away outside leg even before Shadab delivers this legbreak outside off, this shortish ball spins away from Finch. He flays it in the air to Farhan, the debutant, who hangs onto the catch with both hands at cover. No fifty for the Finchmeister
googly, short, clipped with the break to deep square leg
flat dart just outside off, Finch can't get under it, ends up hacking it straight of long-on for a double
looped up outside off, Finch drops down to one knee, sizes it up and clubs it over the long-on fielder for another six

oh, he seems to specialise in this kind of bowling. Good length ball grips the pitch and rips across Finch's outside edge as he defends. Ramdin's sharp behind the stumps, but Finch's backfoot is firmly grounded
full toss on off stump, Finch punches down the ground and they scurry forth for a single
Finch stays leg-side of this legbreak outside off and stabs an inside edge to the bowler's right
full on the stumps, driven away to cow corner, they decide against the second run
dug in short at the body, Finch now misses out on a hook, he was early into the shot, this was the change-up. Cops a blow on the chest
another leg-stump ball, Finch misses out on a flick again
full and slanting outside leg, catches the thigh pad and wanders away in the direction of midwicket
Finch backs away outside leg and launches it with great authority of Sarfraz's head. Looped up wide outside off, Finch stays leg-side of the ball and hoists it for six
short and wide outside off, but with the pace taken off this delivery. Finch looks to cut it square, but he's through his shot too early. Mistimed to short cover

full on middle, and Finch makes room towards the leg side before freeing his arms. Has a proper swing of the bat, and tonks this over midwicket. The bat turns in his hands, but still finds the fence. Fifty in 22 balls!
short and wide, and Finch was waiting for that width. Slaps a cut through the square region and not a single infielder moved an inch!
slower ball, Finch is well fooled as his bottom hand flies off the handle. This was full and teasing outside off. He's far too early on the drive and the ball skews over midwicket
length ball on middle, and Finch pulls this to the sweeper fielder on the leg side once again
full just outside off, and Finch must adjust due to the lack of pace in this delivery. Punched past the bowler to long off

slower ball, but short on off again. Finch drags the pull to deep midwicket, and enough time for the duo to take the second. Wayward throw from the deep to the bowler. If he was accurate, then Short may have been...short
carnage! Full on off, and he shovels this over the umpire. Sends him ducking as the ball races away to the straight boundary
length ball outside off, but angling into Finch. He opens his bat's face and glances it to backward point
yorker on leg stump, but Finch was backing away already to make some extra room. But the ball lands too close to him, and Finch can't drive it away. Goes through to the keeper
full on middle, and turned off his toes to the fielder at deep backward square. Just a single

short and wide outside off, and Finch flat-bats it straight to the bowler. Chibhabha sticks his right hand out, and the ball hits him full on the palm. That must've hurt, but the bowler doesn't show it. The ball goes away to the long-on boundary
short just outside off, and Finch misses the pull over midwicket. Done in by the slower-ball bouncer
length ball outside off, and Finch drags a pull to the leg side on this occasion. The bowler's taken the pace off his bowling in this over
full on middle, and he paddles this behind square on the leg side. Straight to short fine leg though
muscled over cow corner! What power from Finch. It's a half tracker on off, and Finch can really tee up to this delivery. Smashes it to the boundary
back of a length outside off, and Finch tiptoes to flick this off his hips. Played to the backward square leg boundary
full on leg stump, and Finch backs away to make some room. Misses out on the straight drive as the ball hits the keeper's pad
full on middle, and driven inside out to cover. Gives Short the strike once again
back of a length on middle. Finch rocks back and pulls this straight to the fielder at deep backward square
short and wide, Finch gets a bottom edge on the cut. Perhaps not wide enough
full on middle, but drifting down leg. Finch pushes it to deep midwicket for one
savage! Full, but wide outside off. But no problem for Finch. Gets down on one knee again, and drives it over Burl to the straight boundary. One-bounce four
clips to midwicket as this is full and swings in a touch on middle.
swinging way down leg, Finch is frustrated his head falls over but it's a wide and he gets another ball
129kph, driven nicely on the up straight to cover, Finch walked down the track, Kohli fired at the striker's end and hit, there's a review for run out. Finch got his bat back easily
short ball outside off, Finch tries to pull hard but is through the shot and gets a bottom edge that bounces to Pant
141kph, good length outside off, he drives on the up to cover
139kph, good length angling into off, he works with the angle square of midwicket
135kph, short ball, and he pounces and hammers a pull shot through square leg! He got up with the bounce and rolled the wrists. Cracking shot
114kph slower ball, length, he swipes this cross bat high over midwicket, mis timed but it falls well safe and deep midwicket comes around
