full and outside off stump, clipped away wristily to the man on the legside fence
full ball on the stumps, driven down the ground to long on
full toss outside off stump, hit to long on for a single
good shot first up from Kohli, not much wrong with the ball. Batsman advances and hits the length ball on off stump powerfully back past the bowler and to the straight fence
length outside off stump,chopped into the pitch and there's no run
shortish on off stump, pulled well in front of square again and the deep midwicket runs around to keep it to two
backs away and plays that wonderfully late. Beats a diving short-third man, who dives in vain
length ball on the stumps hit into the legside infield for a single
tosses it up and straightens it on off stump, the batsman drives to deep cover
sends the first one wide down the leg side, good collection by the keeper
full on the pads, Kohli just turns this away to deep midwicket
short of a length on off stump, Kohli runs it to third man
full and outside the stumps, driven right into the ground by Kohli. Cover cleans up
length ball outside off stump, Kohli shuffles across and drops that into the big gap in the legside infield
again uses his feet but is not to the pitch of the ball, pushes it to long off calmy
fires it down the leg side, it's too far down
that is too short from Herath, but that doesn't bounce much.. Kohli pulls it along the ground, straight to deep midwicket
fires it full outside off, the batsman punches it down to long off, his hand coming off the handle as he plays that

Afridi leaps at midwicket and gets a hand to it but can't catch it, he takes pace off the ball though which allows the fielder at deep midwicket enough time to save the four. Kohli pulled that very hard. A superb effort from Afridi
played towards cover for a single
Kohli steps out to hit on the leg side but is cramped for room and ends up mis-timing a cut towards point
hit from the crease to long off for a single
another good yorker, the batsman comes back for the second after pushing it to midwicket, but he was always struggling and direct hit ends his innings
another one wide outside off, very wide.. Kohli manages to take it on the full, but can only slice it to deep point
this is good bowling! He keeps it full and wide outside off, Kohli stretches but can't reach it.. this is inside the marker too
full and wide outside off.. Kohli was shaping to play a sweep but adjusts late to guide it to third man
takes a step down and drives it beautifully through cover, where Thiri makes an excellent diving save..
this is a good yorker now! Just outside off and Kohli can only dig it out to extra cover for a single
he comes down the pitch and punches it to midwicket where Dilshan's fumble allows a single
full on leg stump, whipped straight to midwicket
length at off stump, blocked on the front foot
length at middle stump, drilled back down the pitch and bursts through Zampa's hands low to his right
cut off the back foot towards point, Kohli mis-timed that
length at middle stump, allows it to come on and nudges it to deep square

falls short of Stanlake at wide third man. Length ball wide outside off and he chucks his hands at this. Once again, seems to have misjudged the pace of it and is through it early. Slices high to the fielder's right
bouncer dug in too short, ducks under it
length outside off, looks to slog sweep, comes off the inside half to midwicket

taken at short third man! Zampa applies the squeeze on Kohli - 1 run off 5 balls - and has him swatting with no shape under this length ball. Looks like a topspinner. Gets big on Kohli, although he wasn't close to the pitch of that to start with after stepping out. Gets a top edge and it is pouched
he comes down the track and punches this firmly to long on
a good response from Kula! bowls a good yorker outside off and Kohli fails to make contact
this one is hammered down the ground.. What violence! Thisara does well at long on to keep this one in..

this could be a drop here! Sena at deep midwicket misjudges this one.. It was a slower delivery and the batman went for a full-blooded pull, he doesn't get much timing.. Sena comes in a touch and it clears him.. poor judgement from the fielder
follows it up with a murderous drive through cover.. The fielder couldn't get down in time.. hits it so hard this Kohli, using all timing and a lot of wrists
fuller on off, Kohli doesn't want to wait, he thwacks this over wide long-on with ease! This is the ideal pace for him, a lot of bottom hand in that one
flatter and quicker on the pads, the batsman gets down on his knees and dabs it to short fine leg

full and too wide! Malinga is getting the length right but the line is completely off.. This is too wide and all Kohli has to do is get some bat on it, which he does, to pick up a boundary to third man
it's full but it's too wide, easily punched to deep cover for a single that brings yet another half-century for Kohli. he keeps working like a well-oiled machine..
this is nicely driven to deep extra cover, all along the ground, for a couple. It was full and it was wide outside off too
into the mid-riff as this skids under his pull shot. Short of a length ball into the side of his stomach and deflects to Carey's right
superb timing there by Kohli, it was not a bad ball, gave him a fraction of room outside off and he opened the face of the bat and caressed it wide of point
good length outside the off stump and defended to the off side
length ball, pushed across, drops back in the crease and runs one to short third man
and once again he offers the chance, moves away after pitching and Kohli was beaten as he was looking to guide that to third man
tossed up and full, driven through the line to long-off
fuller delivery and driven to the sweeper again
outside the off stump and he punches that down to deep point
Herath dives to his left and stops a drive
chops it to the off side
works it away to deep square leg and he hurries the second run
keeps low and he whips it off the back foot to mid-on
works it to the on side for a single
down the track and hammered back to the bowler
gives him the charge and mistimes it to long-on
brings up his fifty in style! Comes down the track and lofts with the turn over mid-off, the fielder in the deep had no chance
down the track again and he forces it down to long-off
comes forward and drives him down to sweeper cover
mistimes it down to deep midwicket
down the track and he hammers it down to long-on
no stopping him! Kohli chips down the track and lofts against the turn and clears deep midwicket
down the leg side and the ball clips his pads and rolls away, he tried to work it fine
he continues to fined the gaps, he made a bit of room hoping to hit it in front of square on the on side, ended up getting an inside edge past short fine leg, the ball races to long leg
unlucky for the bowler, this was an attempted yorker, Kohli made room and the ball clipped the boot and deflected to the off side, no slips and that's four
yorker length and shaping away, Kohli reached out to squeeze it out but couldn't make contact
another one swerves away from him, he gets some bat on it and Chandimal stops it
that was too wide outside off, Kohli didn't even bother chasing that outside off
keeps it full and wide outside off and he forces it down to long-off

close call for Kohli and they are appealing for a run-out. And it's close! Kohli reaches out to a full and wide delivery outside off, he nearly scoops it straight to extra cover, the throw by Jayawardene is to Perera who's behind the stumps, the third umpire takes a look, he wasn't convinced if the bail came off the groove before he grounded his bat, Kohli is safe
drills it down to long-off
comes down the track and pushes it to deep midwicket
comes down the track and mistimes the loft down to long-off, was in the air for a bit
make that three in three, drifts on the pads and he easily flicks it to fine leg, hardly any fielder in sight there
you can't stop him can you? Full delivery seaming away and he has enough width to slice that past cover and point
the fine leg is up, Perera pitched it fractionally short and down the leg side, he just helped it along its way wide of short fine leg
Kohli nearly edges that one! Perera gets some late movement after pitching and Kohli pokes his bat out at it, Chandimal nearly went up in appeal

short ball, Kohli was coming down the wicket, tries to hook, gets it high in the air and is taken at deep square! Huge strike for England. Kohli in absolutely no control at all of the stroke, lobbed it up, deep square charged in a held a very good catch sliding forward
down the track and calmly knocking this out to long-on
goes for a paddle sweep and gets a bit of a top edge, Gurney coming across from short long leg diving to his left and just can't hold on with his left hand
down the track and whipping this past midwicket to the gap between two deep fielders, great shot
Kohli gives himself a bit of room again, Woakes tries to fire it in at the pad, drifts it down leg
cutter at 76mph, Kohli dabs from off stump to the left of short third man for a quick single
length on off stump, Kohli staying leg side of it drives firmly and steers this past short third man
oh unlucky for Woakes, slower ball, Kohli plays forward, deceived, tries to jam down on it and gets a thin inside edge past leg stump to fine leg
yorker length, dabbed into midwicket, everyone's out on the rope on the leg side, they can run hard and sprint back for the second here, fifty for Kohli in 34 balls
full at the leg stump, Kohli gave himself room and steered this out to long-on
full on the stumps, flicked down to long-on for a simple single to end the over
stays around for the right-hander, Kohli down the wicket too, meets this on the full and plays to long-on for a single
length on middle and off, Kohli steps across and pushes through square leg
tossed up, comes forward, works one to long-on

they finally see the back of Kohli! It was sweetly timed but straight to the fielder at deep midwicket, looked like the slower ball, Kohli swung across the line and it's a flat hit to Thirimanne, easily taken
wide outside the off stump, can't control the swing
much better, brings it closer to the off stump and pushed towards point
crisply driven off the front foot but straight to mid-off
clubbed away! Fractionally short outside the off stump, Kohli picked the length early and pulled off the front foot over midwicket
Kohli and his awesome timing, swings away from the right-hander, just punched it off the front foot and wide of cover, didn't play at it too hard, two fielders give chase
loose shot, wafted at one outside the off stump, moved away slightly
pushed to the off side off the front foot and he sets off quickly
not very convincing but four nevertheless, late away swing and on a full length, really chased it and the ball went sailing over point
punches it to the off side
Kohli at his best, on a good length outside off and what looked like a defensive push was enough to bisect the gap at point, just raced away, great timing
nearly had him there! Goes for the loft over mid-off and he didn't time it as well, just enough to clear the fielder
fullish in length outside off and driven down to mid-off
gets that away movement again, pushed down to cover
another Kohli classic, it was a low full toss outside off and he ensured he pushed it off the middle of the bat, past point
goes for the off drive but mistimes it to mid-off, goes for the quick single
too wide outside the off stump, doesn't offer a shot
similar delivery just dropped into the leg side by square leg
back of a length again, clipped square on the leg side
floated up just outside off, stays in the crease and pushes at it, gets an edge to the 45 on the leg side
forward and a nudge down to long on
length ball, too straight and tucked down to long leg

straight and full, Kohli looks to play into the leg side, misses, big appeal for lbw and given out the finger goes up pretty quickly and Kohli might have been gunned down there because that's looks leg side in the replay. He got quite away across his stumps and the ball nipped back in and beat the bat but by doing might have been going down but may have nicked leg stump
on the stumps and worked for a single into the leg side... Kohli wanted two
here comes Virat again, uses the feet and chips this over extra cover, picks the gap superbly, four more
flighted, on middle and off, Kohli comes forward and wristily turns through midwicket for one more
flat trajectory on the stumps, worked sensibly to leg for a single
sixer, way back over wide long-on! Tossed up and Kholi got out to the pitch, slapped it into the stands
goes back and steers one towards backward point, fielder couldn't gather it cleanly and they get the single
flighted, again uses the feet, works this wider for one to long-on
around the wicket, tossed up on middle and leg, can only work this back to the bowler
slower ball outside off, touch short and pulled through midwicket for one more into the deep
pitched up on middle and leg, dug out for a single to long-on
worked away into the leg side and they come dashing back for the second
gets it through again, past the covers this time, a msfield by a sliding Morgan coming to his left from mid off, that should have been saved
lovely, late cut sends this fine of short third man, Kohli waited on a length ball outside off, dabbed it past the fielder using the pace from the bowler
pitched up in the channel outside off, stays back in the crease and runs one to third man
back of a length, Kohli on the charge, swipes across the line, pulls flat down towards long-on
pitched up outside off, Kohli drives and the bat turns in his hands, bobbles to mid-off
good ball to finish from Woakes, yorker length and dug out to midwicket
slower ball, bouncing up on the stumps and Kohli, for once, mistimes his shot, the ball hitting him in the padding
goes full again, Kohli backs away and larrups four more through extra cover! Wonderful strokeplay, Woakes being given a chasing at the moment
too short this time, Kohli wrists move like quicksilver again, flicking the ball in a high arc over the 45, down to the fine leg boundary for four more
pitched up on off stump, Kohli whips this behind square on the leg side, outrageous shot and it lands almost directly on the boundary marker... Signalled four
starts on a tight line, worked back to the on side, mid-on trots in to prevent a single
uses the feet again, drives back past the bowler and there's a comfortable single there
slower ball, skips out but can't get the drive away, Gurney fields
full and straight, lovely wristwork from Kohli, reaches forwards and whips the ball over midwicket, there's no one out there to prevent four
pitched up outside off, drives hard but extra cover leaps to intercept it
tossed up on middle and leg, goes back and pushes towards the bowler
pitched up around off stump, Kohli skips nimbly forward to drive, mid-off is slightly back and there's one more
starts the over with a big hit, whacks that over long-off, connects superbly and that's taken beyond the boundary quite well by someone possibly from the India support staff
now tucked wide of deep square, more superb timing from Kohli
clear the front leg and clubbed wide of mid on, got enough bat on it
flicked through midwicket on the front foot
floated up onto the middle stump, pushed to cover
similar delivery, flicked down to long off this time
length just outside off, driven to deep cover
step down the track and a bit of a hack, gets it off the inside half of the bat to long off
just outside off and cut hard, a fast flick of the wrists to the point boundary
length ball, pushed into the covers
flat, on the stumps, nudged through backward square leg
tossed up on off, worked through mid-on on the front foot
full and outside off, whipped forcefully between long-on and deep midwicket, good running gets Kohli two, though Raina has to prostrate himself at the bowler's end to make his ground
lovely shot, Kohli skips out of his crease and slaps a rising cover drive over the infield, beating the sweeper no trouble
pitched up, slower ball and punched down the ground to long-on
slower delivery in the channel outside off, waits on it and punches to long-off coming forward

bowled him, Kohli chops on! This stayed down, Meaker maybe rolled his fingers on it, the ball drifting back in from outside off and Kohli attempted a back-foot pull, it clipped the bottom of the bat and clattered into off stump, Meaker bellowing the full-blooded celebrations this time around
blocked coming forward off the inner half of the bat, gets it through square leg but a no-ball, big un n'all
well, that was quick but completely misdirected, about two feet down the leg side, nearly going beyond the return crease, Buttler does terrific work to cling on
slightly back of a length outside off, punched through cover point, not quite timed
blocked into the off side from a length just outside off, the scamper a single
off stump, blocked back up the wicket
blocked into the off side for another quick single
full on the stumps and flicked through midwicket, well timed
back of a length and crucially wide enough to cut, thrashed dismissively to the point fence
length on the stumps, tucked to midwicket
on the back foot, blocked into the covers with soft hands and they take a quick single, good running
big bumper, too high, ignored
and now pulled over square leg, good timing again from Kohli
whoops! Miles, miles down leg side this, that was Morkel-esque!
fuller length now, goes to drive and gets it off the inner half of the bat through midwicket
oh lovely, sweet-as-you-like cover drive, timed to perfection on the up through cover
straighter line and kept out into the leg side from the crease
movement again, away from the bat just outside off, Kohli pushed at it and missed
worked in front of square leg for a couple, India move to 99
short of length ball on off stump, chopped off the back foot towards cover, dot ball
length ball spinning just a bit away towards off, pushed off the front foot
starts with a full toss on the pads, worked away for one
slower ball again, short outside off, he rolls his wrists on this, gets a single to third man
bowled so slowly outside off stump, Kohli waits in his crease and opens the face late to dab the ball towards third man
nudged off the pads in front of square for a single
short and wide, but finds that square third man for a single
short of a length, pitched outside leg, worked away to leg for another single
good pace there, short of a length, 145ks, just outside off, right behind it in defence
a flat long hop outside off, Kohli hits the ball along the ground through extra cover but can't find the gap on the boundary
defended back to the bowler
dragged short, Kohli goes back and pulls the ball towards long on
nudged with soft hands in front of point for a single
Muirhead strikes second ball! He isn't afraid to toss this up, draws Kohli out of the crease and he lofts down the ground, he can't clear long-off though, taken by White at the edge of the circle
Kohli moves forward and dabs the ball towards mid-on, the fielder from midwicket runs in quickly but mis-fields to allow the single
tossed up by Muirhead and he gets an inside edge to the leg side
third man is the most favored location, once again opens the face of the bat and gently steers it there, time for a slip?
a full ball outside off, Kohli plays a cracking square drive off the front foot, sending the ball racing to the point boundary
driven down the ground to long off for a single
he stays back at the crease and clips it to midwicket
a full ball on the pads, Kohli drives through midwicket to bring up his half-century
good running, he stays back and knocks it to the on side and sets off quickly
driven to long off once again
gets on to the front foot by moving across towards the off side and drives to long on
Narine pitches the offbreak on middle and spins it down leg, Ramdin appeals to try and throw off the umpire, but he calls it wide
this was shorter outside off and he stays beside the line and places it to deep point
this was smacked hard onto the pitch and had enough mileage to whizz past Watson, long-off's there to cut it off
good length outside off and he fails to make contact on the cut
played with an open face towards backward point
moves back and across in his crease and nudges towards square leg
a full ball on off stump, Kohli strides forward and drives through extra cover
a length ball, wicket to wicket line, pushed towards midwicket from the crease
defended on the front foot on the off side
driven hard back at him, misifelded by Tahir for one
pulled to deep midwicket for one more
short of a length, dabbed away to short third for one, Tahir's throw is not backed up properly at short midwicket. They take the second
nudged off the pads through square leg, the line was a bit too straight from Santokie
pitches outside leg, easy pickings for Kohli, who stays in his crease and turns it of his pads wide of the fielder at short line leg
another shocker, especially with fine leg in the circle, full and on the pads from over the wicket, Kohli flicks and collects an easy boundary wide of short fine leg
a slower ball on off and middle, defended on the off side
short, pitched outside leg, regulation pace, he goes back and pulls it wristily over short fine. Think this has carried all the way for six. Replays show it hasn't. Just bounced inside
down the wicket, Tahir pulls the length back, drives this to long-off for one
gets a bottom edge on this attempt to cut. Gets a single to short third
on a length, on the pads, Kohli retains the strike with a single
bunted into the leg side, Kohli wants two as deep midwicket runs in to field, but Yuvraj turns his down
a full ball on leg stump, Kohli leans forward and nudges through midwicket
Kohli takes charge now. Down the wicket, right to the pitch, clean-swings it over long-on. India too bowled Raina in the 11th over. Duminy bowling one too many too?
Narine over-steps while bowling a big off break, nudged behind square for a single ... free-hit coming up
short of a length, angling across, guided to third man for one
stylishly flicked away, this was pitched up on off stump and he clipped that easily over mid-on and midwicket
nudged off the pads through square for one more
short of a length, goes off the splice of the bat, for a single to leg
on a length, on the pads, another single ensues
starts with a friendly full toss on the pads, Kohli puts it away by moving forward and flicking fluently into the gap on the midwicket boundary
dabbed off the back foot behind point for one more
wide down the leg side. There have been quite a few of those tonight
down the wicket, yorks himself up, gets a single to long-on
a full ball outside off stump, Kohli moves forward and across to drive the ball towards long-on
another slower ball, Kohli bunts it towards long-on, with soft hands. He has called for two just as the ball hits the bat. Takes the second easily
slower ball, offcutter, he covers it, dabs it towards third man, Duminy makes a half save at point, and concedes the second
drives a length ball on the up, gets a single to deep cover
short of a length, on off, steered away for one
worked off the pads through square for another single
pushed through quicker and flatter, pushed to long-off for one
Kohli moves back and across to glance the ball off his pads behind square
short of a length, moves across the line, works this to leg for one
that's a bit wide outside off stump, the batsman lets it go

Kohli's been bowled and he does not like it! He was aiming for the big shot across the line, the ball pitched outside off and he got an inside edge back on to his stumps. Swings his bat in disappointment.
this was bowled on a yorker length outside off, fails to connect on the drive and the bat hits the ground
bowls a slower delivery outside off, Kohli comes forward and pushes it down to long on
this stays low and comes slower off the pitch, but Kohli adjusts his whip to the leg side, hitting it to wide long on
pushed through too far down the leg side
lots of flight on this one, Kohli comes down the pitch and drives it along the ground to long off
fuller and outside off, the batsman pushes it with an open face to the gap at cover point
now keeps the strike with a dab to square leg
flatter and outside off, he is quick to rock back, then punches this firmly past the lone cover fielder.. Runs away to the boundary in quick time
he stays back and clips the flatter delivery to deep midwicket

there is no stopping Kohli though! He comes down the pitch, makes the ball a half-volley and whips it over midwicket with ease.. He never looks in any trouble playing these shots.. Lots of wrist in that one
he comes down the pitch and pushes this softly towards deep midwicket, they call early and manage to complete a tight second
comes forward and punches the length delivery straight down the ground for a single
he comes down the pitch and pushes the back of length delivery calmly down to long on
tossed up, this one turns as well, but easily tucked to deep square leg off the back foot
flatter and quicker, the batsman goes back and pushes it straight to cover
bowls a good offcutter, the batsman dabs it to midwicket and looks for a couple, but Rohit turns the second one down
the batsman comes forward and dabs it to the right of midwicket for an easy single
this one stays low and turns in, the batsman looks to punch it to long on but is not in control, ends up pushing it in the air
tossed up nicely, the batsman comes forward and defends it solidly
another tossed up delivery, but this is slightly outside off. Kohli allows it to turn, then taps it softly past the slip fielder for a couple
tossed up from wide of the crease, the batsman goes back and defends
this one is too far down the leg side, easy call for the umpire
this one was the arm-ball and Kohli - he read the length right, but not the spin.. looks to pull, but doesn't get his timing right
stays back and dabs it to the right of midwicket for an easy single
length delivery on the stumps, Kohli goes back and clips it straight to midwicket
length delivery outside off, no room from the bowler, the batsman can only dab it to the leg side for a quick single
stays in the crease and whips the length delivery to deep square leg for a single

wow! This is the repeat of the shot Anamul played in the first session! It was full delivery outside off, a half-volley, and Kohli goes down on his knee, gets under it, and smashes it over extra cover for a huge hit
he corrects his length this time, the batsman clips it to deep square leg for a single
looks like a front foot defensive push, but that quickly goes to wide long-off and Kohli picks up an easy couple
back of length delivery outside off, Virat steers it easily to third man for a single
he stays in the crease and defends the length delivery solidly to cover point
slower short ball, he rides the bounce, works this to leg with soft hands, and he calls Yuvraj for another second. And they make it as deep square leg has to run in
takes it from the keeper's gloves! He waits for this short of length delivery, then cuts it late to beat the short third man fielder comfortably
fuller and quicker, the batsman comes forward and punches it to long off
the intent was there when he made a hint of room, ended up punching it straight to cover, nicely timed
makes a bit of room and comes down a few paces and checks his shot, places it to third man
fullish outside off and he mistimes it to cover
gets away with another full and wide one this time, reaches out and places it to cover
he chases a really wide one, this was too wide outside off, gets the toe of the bat and still races to third man
that came out of nowhere! After a few quiet deliveries Kohli gets on his knee and slogs him high and quick over deep midwicket, tremendous bat speed there
pushed through quicker and he drives to the off side
he fires this wide down the leg side
he stays back and punches it to the on side
he goes back and punches it with the turn to long-on and jogs the single
flatter one and Maxwell clips it to the leg side
low full toss and he forces it down to long-on
quicker one and he punches it to the on side
fuller on off stump, Kohli plays his whippy offdrive to deep cover for a single
bowls a good slower ball on off, but all the men on the leg side are patrolling the boundary, so the batsmen pick up a single to midwicket
he takes a step down, but Mashrafe bowls a slow offcutter. Kohli chops it straight to point
length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it straight to midwicket
he comes down the pitch and slices the full delivery down to third man for a single
fuller on the pads, Kohli flicks this easily to deep midwicket
bowls an offcutter outside off, Kohli dabs it down to third man for a single
short and wide, Kohli has already advanced down the crease and he punches it to deep cover to bring up the century of the partnership
fuller delivery outside off, Kohli punches this easily to long off for a single
he leans into the fuller delivery to punch this to long off to bring up his half-century
fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman drives it down the ground to long on
he comes down the pitch and looks to hit it over the top with the turn, doesn't get hold of it and it drops well short of the deep midwicket fielder
flatter and shorter, the batsman pulls it past the short fine leg fielder for a couple.. 100 is up
gets a lot of spin, but this is misdirected, goes well down the leg side
he comes down the pitch, but gets an inside edge to midwicket as he looks for the big shot
stays on the back foot and punches the flatter delivery to deep midwicket for a single
flatter delivery on the stumps, defended down the pitch
he takes a step down the crease and pushes the length delivery down to long on

caught behind! Kohli moved across his stumps to a short of a length ball that climbed on him and he ended up gloving the glance, AB moved quickly to his left and caught it. India in trouble now. Kohli was cramped for room by how much that ball rose
beautiful slower bouncer. Kohli is flummoxed. Gets a bottom edge, which luckily for him doesn't hit the stumps
draws Kohli forward with his length and spins the leg break past the outside edge of the forward push
this game is all over now. He shimmies down the wicket, gets inside and under a shortish delivery, and goes over point for four. This is some innings from Kohli
short of a length, angling in, pushed towards deep midwicket, Kohli puts pressure for the second, Amla misfields running in
lovely outswinger, just outside off, Kohli looks to drive to cover, but is beaten by the movement away
135kph, good length, he walks a pace down to the line and whips this sumptuously wide of mid on for two. What a way to get off the mark!
132kph, short ball, he's pulling but gets it off the toes of the bat and rolls it around to deep fine leg
137kph, fuller length, he drives nicely to deep cover-point
85kph, around the wicket, drifting to middle, he defends on the front foot
shorter length on leg, he whips this nicely to deep square leg
flighted slower and fuller, he drives straight to cover
95kph, good length on off, he's back and pushing this to midwicket
drifting outside leg, on the front foot he works this through square leg and Kohli immediately calls two, great running. He is so good at that
flighted outside off, a slog sweep flat along the ground to deep long on
flatter outside off, deft late cut to fine short third man
short and wide and Kohli pounces, cuts this hard and places past point! Great stroke from Kohli
leans forward as he get to the pitch of the offbreak on leg stump and works it through midwicket
stays back in his crease against the googly, picking the variation, waiting for it to turn into him, and them flicks it sweetly to deep midwicket
gorgeous late cut but even still, it should only have been a single. Lynn at short third man mistimes his dive and gives away a couple more
mis-hits it over point! Kohli is trying to make room, trying to one-up Maxwell who has been trying to deny that. The ball drifts away from him just enough to make him lose his shape
turns the length ball on middle through square leg
shortish and outside off, he stands tall and pulls it through midwicket
picks the googly as he stays back and flicks the quicker delivery through midwicket
goes wide of the crease to ensure the ball slants into Kohli, dipping at the last second to beat Kohli on the flick
short and outside off, Kohli pulls it to long-on
Kohli defends this one off the back foot
down the leg side
defended off the front foot, edged onto the pad
blocks another one, three dots to start for Kohli
driven towards cover, and Kohli is still not off the mark
lovely from Kohli, waits on the back foot, and gently guides the legspinner past slip for four, great way to get off the mark
and India don't even need Kohli. Short, waist high, poor bowling really at that pace. Pulled away for four through square leg
slower bouncer, Kohli shimmies down and pulls this to deep midwicket for one
146kph, good length on leg, he works it to midwicket
shorter length, on middle and leg, he jumps back in defence into cover
fired this flat as usual, keeps it on off stump, another dot ball, big shot next?
nope, the final ball is clipped towards square leg for a single, India's 100 comes up, Doherty does well after that first-ball six

McKay's uncanny ability to take wickets is on show again, this time he gets the big one of Kohli, who charged down the track to a short of length ball, looking to muscle that over wide long-on, caught just within the rope at wide long-on
comes down the pitch again and Herath fires it into his pads, Kohli pushes it straight to midwicket
comes down the pitch again and almost yorker himself with that one, manages to dig it out towards mid on
he comes down the pitch immediately and plays a crisp drive down to long off, just a single there
he waits on the back foot and pushes it softly towards midwicket for another single
slower from Mathews, the batsman pushes it to midwicket with soft hands and charges down for a single but the fielder from long on keeps them to one..
fuller delivery, that is punched firmly to the off side but Sena dives to his left and prevents the single
pretty one! He comes down the pitch and easily launches it over wide long-off with an inside out drive.. The fielder was there, but he clears him by a fair margin.
he comes forward and pushes it to long off for a single

dropped, how costly is that going to be! Malinga at midwicket is not able to hold on to over head stinger..It was marginally short and Kohli went for the pull straightaway, but didn't get the elevation
short and wide outside off, Kohli just opens the face to run it down to third man
another length delivery around off stump, Kohli dabs it towards midwicket to pick up an easy single
down the leg side for another wide, Kohli charges back for the second, so four dot balls but he has still conceded four runs
some turn on this one, cramps Kohli for room as he looks to cut this, but he manages to chop it behind point
tossed up and full on off, the batsman pushes it straight to midwicket
he goes deep in the crease and clips the flatter delivery from off stump to deep midwicket
another single to third man, India happy picking up the singles at the moment
stays in the crease and picks up a single at backward point with a dabbed shot
well fielded by Herath at short fine leg.. He saves a certain boundary there. Kohli had just tried to clip it past him
he comes forward and punches the length delivery firmly, but hits it to short cover
that almost kisses the outside edge! Kula is always a dangerous bowler. After bringing the last two in, this one straightens and beats the bat
he takes a positive forward stride and pushes this length delivery to mid-off
oh what wrists! He takes a step down the pitch and whips this inswinging delivery through midwicket, all along the ground
waits in the crease and dabs the back of length delivery to wide mid on for a single
he comes forward and punches the length delivery to cover
tries a short delivery first up but this sails over outside off, Kohli lets it go

Kohli finishes it off. And he lets out a roar. What a knock under high pressure. What a chaser he is. This is like Yuvraj finishing that quarter-finals chase off against Australia. What release of pressure. He has soaked it all in, and ends it with a flick past midwicket
full angled across, he is cautious, playing a text book defensive push to cover

almost a chance of run out at non-striker's! This was hit straight to Malinga at square leg but Rohit was already halfway down..The throw just bounced a bit awkwardly for the bowler..Would have been tricky
defended towards point for a single, nine off the over though the first four balls were dot balls
whipped towards square leg
mis-hit behind square leg, but it brings up his fifty. The slower short ball has him playing a touch too early; reaching in front of him as he goes for the pull
hustles it away towards the deep midwicket boundary as Starc bowls a full one on off stump from round the wicket
141 kph, tries to whip a back of a length ball angled into his thighs, but he's into the shot a tiny bit early and the ball lobs off his thigh
pulls the short ball from outside off to deep square leg
beats him with a slower ball that Kohli swings across the line and misses completely
is that not a wide, asks Kohli, after he doesn't make contact with another short, slower ball outside off
thumps it down the ground. It's a half-volley, in Kohli's swinging arc, and he hammers it away. He's pumped. He's punching the air. He's sensing the series going level
swings it out to the vacant areas around midwicket and celebrates with arms aloft. India level the series

what wrists there from Kohli. How has he got that power with just a flick. On a length, middle and leg, and he has used that bottom hand to get this aerial shot wide of long-on. Kohli is pumped. Super pumped
and he starts with a wide. Is it getting to South Africa now? Down leg here
short of a length, flicked away to deep midwicket for one
googly, he picks it late, is outside the crease, and he dabs it for one

Kohli gets to fifty in style. What a big innings this is turning out to be. Slogs this legbreak from outside off. They have had a deep midwicket for him, and he clears the field. He takes the risk, but backs himself enough
swept away, against the turn, straight of deep midwicket, takes two
gets up with the short ball outside off and swats it to deep point
full and wide, he drives this after stepping put, but a dive by Faf at cover keeps them down to one
short ball, but they have the deep midwicket there for the pull
length ball is flicked to the midwicket boundary, doesn't bother keeping it down, picking the gap perfectly
slower ball, middle and leg, pushed to long-on for one
charges at him again, not there to the pitch of it, gets a single to wide long-off
tossed up fuller on off and middle, Kohli drives to mid-on and takes a single
in the blockhole first over, dug out to midwicket
Kohli moves forward and across to one that slants across him and steers to third man
down the wicket, yorks himself up, gets a single to long-on
the slower ball around off stump, steered towards third man
down the wicket, not quite to the pitch of it, drills this to long-off for one. Miller does well there to keep them down to one
slower ball outside off, Kohli doesn't time the cut. Gets just the single
a loose full toss, Kohli launches it off the front foot into the gap on the cow corner boundary
all the way this time, Badree drags the ball short, Kohli moves back in a flash and pulls over the cow corner boundary, just clears the rope
flatter and faster outside off, Kohli is beaten on the cut
flicks away a full ball, and South Africa have a deep midwicket. That is a good fielding position for Kohli
nudged off the front foot through midwicket
taps it into the vacant midwicket region, always looking for two, and getting it in the end
launches it over deep midwicket! Spectacular hit, coming down the track, and even though he isn't to the pitch of the ball, he holds his balance and that's where he gets all that power from
comes down the pitch, only to inside edge the back of a length ball that denies him the room he wants
length ball on the pads, clipped towards midwicket, this was another doosra

huge appeal for a caught-behind, Kamran Akmal is convinced but the umpire isn't, this one spins down the leg side after pitching just outside off, umpire doesn't signal wide as well, so he rules that it is off the pad
short of length ball, guided towards square leg
full ball is crisply driven to mid-on
short of length ball spinning towards the pads, bounce there, Kohli defends to the leg side
off the pad and that loops high and lands on the pitch
Hafeez drops it short and that is hammered over midwicket for six, takes on the man in the deep and clears him
full ball is pushed towards long-on for a single
short of length ball just outside off, steered down to third man for a single
spins in towards off, clipped towards square leg for a single
on the pads, stayed a touch low, taps this behind square leg for a single
Kohli steps down the track and plays a lofted drive past long-off, Kohli guiding India's chase yet again
outside off and that is guided towards deep backward point for two more
works it through midwicket, along the ground this time
careful defence off the front foot
clipped behind square leg for one more
Kohli comes down the track and then guides the ball towards deep backward point
back of a length ball, Kohli opens the face to run the ball towards third man
a low full toss just outside off, whipped in front of square leg
full ball that Kohli wanted to carve through cover with a flat bat, too full for that sort of shot, he misses
blocked off the front foot towards cover
Ajmal's quota is over, clipped towards square leg, good effort from Ajmal, 1-18 even though he was slogged for three fours in his first over
defended towards point off the front foot
Kohli yells at himself after he fails to make contact with a length ball wandering away down leg
lashes it over point. Excellent work from Kohli, getting on top of the ball, waiting on it so he can get the gap behind point
times it perfectly - both the step down the pitch and the bat swing that comes down and goes straight through the line of the ball. Outstanding shot over long-off
slower ball, and that lack of pace is useful in deceiving Kohli, as he plays the flick and misses
back of a length and outside off, Kohli taps it behind point
full on middle, Kohli tucks it through midwicket
Kohli wants to finish this off early, he dances down the track and absolutely lashes this past the bowler for four
short of a length and slower, with springy bounce, Kohli gets on his toes to get on top of the bounce and plays the ball on the leg side
short of a length but not short enough to pull, Kohli mis-times the shot on the leg side
Kohli moves forward and punches a good length ball to point
tossed up on middle and leg and he clips it towards midwicket

Warner takes it at the edge of long-on! Hogg drops it a bit short and Kohli stays back and pulls, he realises instantly that he may not have got the required distance, Warner jogs back at long-on and doesn't have to look back, Hogg takes a wicket in his first over in his comeback
short of a length and there's width outside off, Kohli stays back, moves towards the ball and cuts late, it's in the air but wide of the diving fielder at short third man
Kohli goes back and defends
width outside off stump and Kohli plays a flashy cut, along the ground to the fielder at deep point
driven to long off for a single
Kohli moves back and cuts the ball hard in front of cover point
Kohli goes back and cuts the ball late in front of the fielder at backward point, India reach 50
that's too wide outside off stump
driven to long off for a single

down the track, gets to the pitch but flicks it aerially straight down long-on's throat. Zampa got a hint of drift which perhaps resulted in Kohli dragging the ball to the leg side when he may have preferred going straight over the bowler's head
full on middle, swatted past the bowler, who got a hand to it
down the track and bursts through the hands of the cover fielder for a couple
short and pulled off the frontfoot well in front of square but only for one
length outside off, extra bounce, Kohli rides it and steers it to third-man
short on middle, Kohli whips it away to deep squareleg
length on middle, pushed to long-on
slower ball outside off, steered to third-man
length outside off, steered to third-man
the famous flick of the wrists and over squareleg for four! Full on middle, picked up through squareleg in time honoured fashion
length outside off, tighter line though means that Kohli can only steer it to third-man
slashed and slashed over point. It was length outside off, too much width and Kohli pounced on it
length outside off, steered to third-man
full on middle and Kohli blasts it past the bowler, down the ground for his first boundary
length outside off, steered to third-man
length on off, down the wicket comes Kolhi to try and blast him through the covers, only gets a thick inside edge near his feet
length on middle, Kohli skips down the wicket and defends back to the bowler
Kohli reaches out for a delivery that floats across him and gets an outside edge past the keeper to the third man boundary, that was the googly from the chinaman
shorter length and Kohli goes back and pulls to the deep square leg boundary
drops it short and he thumps it down to long-on, Warner throws it over the keeper's head and they take the overthrow
stays back and tucks it down to deep midwicket
continues round the wicket to the right-hander, Kohli tries to run it down the off side but misses
tucks it towards short square leg and he takes a single
Kohli makes a bit of room by moving towards leg and then lofts the ball over midwicket
the slower ball bounces a bit more on Kohli as he defends
full and wide outside off, Kohli reaches out for it and square drives, he can't beat Bairstow at point though
short ball down leg side, Kohli swivels and pulls, he gets some bat on it, enough bat to send the ball past the diving Kieswetter
a slower ball bowled short of a length, Kohli tries to pull but mis-times it towards mid-off, was in the air but fell well short of the fielder
fullish length on off and middle from over the wicket, Kohli drives to mid-on
shorter length and Kohli pulls from the crease, hitting it in the air but short of the fielder at deep midwicket
a slower ball, which Kohli tries to hit too hard and mis-times on the leg side

caught splendidly on the wide long-on boundary! Hales is the catcher. The beauty of that catch was in the amount of ground Hales had to cover by running to his left from deep midwicket. He got there in time and took it on the run on the edge of the boundary. Kohli had latched on to a short, slower ball and pulled it high over deep midwicket. He thought he had hit it into the gap, but Hales was too quick
Kohli moves back and across towards the off to flick the ball in the air in front of square leg, he had to hurry to play that shot
bowled flat outside leg stump, on the pads, played off the back foot to square leg
bottom edges the cut into the ground towards backward point
incredible batting, Kohli moves forward and towards the off side to cover the line and drives the ball so smoothly all along the ground, beating mid-on to his right with superb wristwork
the offcutter, Kohli bottom edges the ball on the off side
Kohli dabs the ball towards point and runs
shuffles and he clips it towards square leg to get off the mark
stays back and clips it against the turn to the on side and he has to scamper the single
Lee slides that one down the leg side and don't ask me why this wasn't given a wide!
elegantly flicked away behind square on the on side, sign of a batsman in form
down the leg side again and Kohli glances at the umpire, wide called this time
shuffles and tries to knock it to the on side again but the ball clips his hips and rolls aweay
shot of intent from Kohli! Makes a hint of room and takes a pace down the pitch, gets under the bounce and lofts cleanly over long-on
a bit wide outside off and he punches it wide of mid-off
good running again, he squeezes out a yorker swinging in late to the off side and sets off for a quick single
he picks a slower delivery from outside the off stump and mistimes the pull to the on side
excellent running by Kohli, he clips it in front of mid-on and puts pressure on the fielder
chips down the track and mistimes it down to deep square leg
full on middle and off and he clips it elegantly towards deep midwicket
stays back and clips it down to midwicket
round the wicket, shapes to cut but misses
turns and skids, Doherty posing some questions here, Kohli cuts
good length around off, Kohli punches toward cover
defended from the crease towards cover
Kohli was on the front foot to a good length ball and was beaten as he tried to defend
edged and caught! Kohli was on the front foot, pushing away from his body at a good length ball that bounced a bit more, he got a thick edge and Wade dived to his right to hold a sharp catch

pitched up, Kohli oozing confidence as he drives his first ball towards extra cover, there was a direct hit at the non-striker's end as Sehwag turns back after thinking of a single, he's made it by a few inches
short of a length ball outside off, steers it down to third man for a single
short of length ball outside off, Kohli gets forward and defends to the off side
not quite off the middle of the bat there, a length ball around off, a thick outside edge in front of point
back of a length ball angling in towards middle and leg, Kohli looks to work that one away but is struck on the thigh pad
Dawlat grunts again, punched towards point, Afghanistan's fielding has been sharp today

fifth dot ball in a row, scratch that, there is an overthrow, crashed off the front foot towards cover, bounces awkwardly towards Nabi, who gets his body in the way, struck on the knee as he stops it, then there's a shy at the stumps at the striker's end, which results in a free run
pitched up and driven back towards the bowler
lovely stroke, from Kohli this time, driven on the up, doesn't try to power it too much, it races through to the cover boundary, this guy is in some form
struck on the pads as he looks to work the ball to the leg side, that was sliding down
drilled towards mid-off for a single
Karim Sadiq starts with a length ball, worked towards midwicket for a single
full ball on the stumps, eased towards long-on for a single
a touch shorter but on the pads, worked towards square leg for one more
driven towards cover off the front foot
another single, again to long-on
a splendid hit from Kohli, dead straight, over the sightscreen, that was a length ball just outside of off, Kohli launches that one over the bowler's head, 93m that one travelled
slower ball, Kohli skips down the pitch, decides against the big hit and pushes it back towards the bowler
drilled powerfully down the ground, dances down the pitch and drives it a touch uppishly to the right of long-off, four more to Kohli
pushed towards cover for a single
worked towards long-on this time, another single, runs off every ball this over
full on middle and leg, single to long-on
gets forward and pushes that towards cover for one more
length ball on the pads, whipped towards deep square leg by Kohli
short ball, Kohli skips down the track and works it towards mid-on
dropped it a bit short and that is pulled towards long-on
lashed down the ground by Kohli, once more Kohli gets an on-the-up drive to the right of the mid-off fielder, plenty of power on that one
played off the pads towards fine leg
Kohli taps the ball towards wide mid-on and they run two because the fielder from the deep has to cover lots of ground
nudged from the crease on the leg side
Kohli's lucky there! He tried to pull a ball that wasn't too short from outside off and got a top edge that flew high over slip to the third-man boundary
played towards long on for a single
driven to long on for one more
good length on off stump, Kohli moves back and across to defend on the off side
Kohli waits on the back foot for the ball to turn and plays it late towards midwicket
pushed off the front foot into the covers
a bit of movement into the right-hander after angling across from over the wicket, flicked off the pads again in front of square
sublime from Kohli, moves forward and towards the off and flicks the ball crisply off the pads to deep square leg, the throw is poor and arrives middle of the pitch
Kohli stays balanced in his crease, moving slightly forward and across to drive the ball to long on

Kohli is bowled in a roundabout way. Boyce has kept Australia in the contest. This has been a good contest between him and Kohli. Kohli has been charging at Boyce who has still been managing to york him with some dip on his deliveries. This one takes the cue end, hits the pad, ricochets into the stumps
that's third straight fifty for Kohli. In the form of his life. Down the wicket to drive this legbreak wide of long-off for two. Acknowledges the crowd all around the dial
nicely bowled, gets it to dip on his toes, but Kohli has managed to place it wide of long-on for two
down the wicket, gets too close to it, and punches it to extra cover
a touch too short, and Kohli spots it early and rocks back pull it in front of deep midwicket for four. Pressure on the bowler already
wide length ball driven to deep cover for one
short ball and Kohli pulls the ball towards deep midwicket, Gambhir runs hard for the second and beats Brett Lee's throw
lovely yorker to cramp him up
goes wide on the crease, cramps him up, chipped to long-on for one
slower short ball, dabbed to short third man for one
low full toss, punched wide of deep cover for a couple
yorker as Kohli gives him the charge. Just the single to long-off
down the wicket, takes this on the full, takes a single to long-on
low full toss, driven to long-off
quick, on a length, 147ks, tucked away off the pads for one
hit hard off the back foot towards extra cover where Bailey makes a five save
full and straight, Kohli drives to long off
grunt from Tait as he lets this wide full ball in, and Kohli squeezes it out beautifully past point for two
full, middle and leg, driven to long-on for one
that's short and Kohli goes right back and pulls the ball powerfully along the ground to the midwicket boundary
another short ball but this time Kohli mis-times the pull slightly, hitting it through square leg
short of a length outside off stump, Kohli moves towards it and cuts in front of point
full and wide outside off, and Kohli drives away from his body. Outside-edge past first slip to third man
length ball, too wide outside off, but Kohli chases after it. Cut square to the fielder manning the boundary on the off side
length ball, wide outside off, and turning further away. Kohli tries to defend, but toe-ends the shot to the off side
shot! it was bowled fuller from Johan, and Kohli waited for an instant to get the placement perfect, between long off and sweeper cover, and it sped to the boundary

goes for one shot too many, and gets bowled! it was shortish, and he went back to pull it, but it skidded on to him, and past the blade to crash into the stumps, this is a big wicket, Kohli was hitting them cleanly

first six of the innings! Kohli doing this superbly now! Gets down on one knee and slog sweeps the ball, might have been a bit of a top edge but the timing was good enough to clear backward square leg
comes forward and tucks the ball off his pads through square leg
short of a length and the ball stops on Kohli, he tries to turn the ball on the leg side but the leading edge takes the ball towards the bowler
steered behind point for a single

short of a length angling across the right-hander, Kohli moves back and across and pulls flat over midwicket, Sharjeel lumbers to his left from deep midwicket and dives, he gets a hand on the ball and stops it but then the ball rolls on to the boundary
pitches outside leg and turns further away, Sarfraz skips nimbly to his left and collects
shot! Moves forward and towards the off side to drive with the turn past the diving fielder at midwicket, India get to fifty
tossed up from around the wicket on middle and off, Kohli moves forward and drives through midwicket, he looks in no trouble out there
too full outside off, Kohli drives off the front foot to long off, India building nicely now
bowled slowly on off stump, this went straight on, Kohli stayed back and opens the face to push towards point
a full ball outside off, Kohli drives smoothly off the front foot to wide long off, Malik covers good ground to his left sto keep the batsmen to one
the cutter outside off, immediately harder to time well, Kohli plays it to cover off the front foot

shot! A full ball on off and middle, Kohli moves forward and across to flick crisply through square leg, 144 kph, not the pace you want to bowl on this pitch unless you get the length and line spot on
slower ball on middle and leg, tucked through square leg, Kohli sprints the first but Yuvraj says no to the second, Amir had got to the ball quickly
shot! Short of a length with width outside off, Kohli stays back and opens the face to steer the ball behind point, superb balance and placement
goes back and mis-times the ball towards long off, Afridi is ripping them leg breaks
Kohli goes back and slugs a shorter ball behind square, big turn for Afridi too, Kohli dragged that off the bottom edge
short of a length cutter angling across the batsman from over the wicket, the ball springs up across Kohli who moves back and across and lets it go
short of a length at pace on leg stump - not the length or the line or the pace for this pitch - Kohli moves back and across and tucks behind square
short of a length outside off, Kohli works it to midwicket but can't get the single.
offcutter cramps Kohli for room outside off, but he steers into the covers to open his account. First runs in England for him.
back of a length, angling down the leg side, Kohli helps it along to fine leg for one.
another one on leg stump for Kohli who glances it to fine leg for an easy couple.

India going through a mini-collapse here, Kohli is gone. Short and wide outside off, perhaps too wide outside off for the pull and he ends up nicking it through to the keeper. It hit really low down the bat too.
Sammy prowls at point. Kohli is away, staying on the back foot and dabbing backward of point and Sammy keeps him down to a single
full-length ball on off stump, Kohli leans out with assurance and steers to point.
this one angles into the pads, Kohli helps it along with the wrists and he gets the single.
misses out on the cut as it turns in from outside off, hit back to the bowler
worked away behind square for a single, tidy over from Peterson
the quicker one, he looks to rock back and cut it, but it hurries on to him
spins into the right-hander from outside off, played to midwicket
dabbed off the front foot on the off side, more of an outside edge

driven to long off to bring up an absolutely incredible half-century on such a tough pitch! He soaks in the applause from a packed Eden Gardens and bows to someone in the stands. Unbelievable performance
and again! Another sublime cover drive! Kohli moves forward and slightly towards leg to make room and uses his wrists to power a bottom-handed cover drive to the boundary
bowls one and gets some inward movement around leg stump, Virat was walking across his stumps, and the ball scooted off the pads behind square, Parnell was interested, no one else was
Kohli makes room to adjust for Ntini's angle and drives a full delivery to the left of cover for a single, there is a mix-up and Virat had to really hurry to make his ground
goes for the cut, the delivery is not short and wide enough, not much bounce as well, goes off the bottom half of the bat straight to a shortish point
creams this one off the middle alright, it goes to Amla at cover who lets it go through him
Virat gets a shortish one on the pads, and tucks it away to fine leg for a boundary, stayed on the back foot and helped it along its way
looks to go for the big off drive, but cannot beat the off side cordon, didn't get the timing right on that one

incredible batting, Kohli moves forward and towards the off to a fuller ball and just punches it through cover with a firm push, the timing is perfect and the fielder on the sweeper boundary has no chance in the pursuit to his right
147 kph on this surface! The extra bounce and the holding of line outside off beats Kohli's waft off the back foot, he was looking to play to third man
short of a length with room outside off, Kohli stays back and just steers the ball towards third man, so smooth
goes for the slower one, Virat waits for it to arrive, and then lifts it over midwicket in that whiplash style of his, picked the length very early there
too straight from Rusty, turned behind square leg for a single
wrists from Kohli, ensures he plays late enough to get it backward of point for one.
short of a length angling across the right-hander, Kohli dabs it calmly behind point and runs, Dhoni hesitates but Kohli urges him on once it passes the fielder
goes back and punches the ball to long on for a single
Kohli goes for the pick-up shot over mid on, and gets it over the man there, it was full, there to be hit, and Virat made good contact

thwack! Ntini went outside off stump this time, and Virat was waiting for it, made some room outside leg and absolutely smashed this full delivery through extra cover for a boundary, the man there put in the dive but the ball had already passed him by then
a slower ball pitching on a good length around off and spins away from Kohli, who pokes and is beaten
the 50 comes up in quick time with a tuck past midwicket off the back foot
defended on the off side
a sublime cover drive! The ball was too full outside off, a half-volley is a gift on this pitch, Kohli drills it to the left of the fielder at cover
good length around off, all Kohli needs to do is just that - drop the ball carefully behind point for a single
full on the pads, flicked away to deep square leg
short of a length angling across the right-hander, Kohli steers to third man
dabbed behind point for a single
stretches out to get to the pitch of this one outside off and pings long off with the drive
so good from Kohli! Moves forward and hits a full ball with the turn along the ground through midwicket, 31 off 20 balls on this pitch is outstanding
leans forward and pushes the ball to long on for a single

swatted away. If Russell's been watching the IPL, he'd know that this is a trademark Kohli shot. Length ball, angling in towards the pads and Kohli gets the front foot across before swat-flicking it with disdain behind square leg.
shot of the morning from Kohli, and off a no-ball too. Over-pitched by Russell outside off and Kohli leans into a pleasing cover drive.
short of a length outside off, Kohli taps from the crease into the off side for another single.

bam. Doesn't get his attempted wide yorker wide enough or full enough, and Kohli takes a step across his stumps to get a little closer and swing through the line to clear the long-off boundary comfortably
full slower ball outside off, quite wide. Goes hard at it, looking to hit over cover, and misses
fullish and quickish on off stump, makes some room and flat-bats it hard to long-off
dangled up slow on leg stump, slog-swept on the bounce to deep midwicket
flat again, on middle and leg, goes back and punches to deep midwicket with a straight bat to bring up his fifty
flat length ball outside off, goes on the back foot to chop it to backward point
flat again, but much fuller this time, right up near Kohli's back leg. Has to drag his front leg away from the line to try and flick it, and misses. Hits his back leg, but easily missing leg stump
back of a length on middle and off, pulled to deep midwicket
stump-high full-toss on off stump, clipped down to deep midwicket

That's a Mahendra Singh Kohli shot alright! A couple of steps down the pitch to the off-stump length ball, and he brings his wrists into play once more to whip it high over the forward square leg boundary
and another! Similar length, wider this time, and Kohli frees his arms to deposit it high over the extra-cover boundary
and yet, he can hit shots like this. Another slower ball, on a length and finishing on about off stump. Kohli just brings his wrists into play and flicks it all the way over the midwicket boundary

ooh, that was pretty much in the slot, and Kohli isn't too pleased with himself. Fullish, a bit of width outside off, and Kohli swings a little too early and misses his lofted off drive. May have been the slower ball, mind

a bit wider, Kohli has to reach out for it. Goes hard at the ball, a kind of front-foot uppercut, and third man, running to his right and diving, can't quite get to it before it bounces, but he can keep it from going to the boundary. Zampa the fielder

excellent wide yorker, almost. Maybe a harsh call from Anil Chaudhary too - only marginally past the tramline, but Kohli had shuffled across in premeditation too. Reached out for it but couldn't connect
length ball on off stump, and Kohli shuffles away from the line to make a bit of room, and lofts it cleanly, into the gap and over the boundary, to the left of long-off
back of a length on off stump, carved away to deep point
back of a length on off stump, pulled to long leg, off the inner half of the bat. Kohli seems to be going a little too hard at some of his shots today
length ball outside off, carved up and over the covers, to the right of the sweeper. Not quite middled - he may have wanted to hit it straighter than where it landed up
flat again, straightens towards middle and leg, goes deep in his crease to pull to deep square leg
flattish, back of a length, angling across the stumps from over the wicket. Rocks back to pull to the right of long-on
tossed up outside off, driven to sweeper cover

not that short at all, but Kohli is onto the back foot in a flash to create a boundary opportunity. Not that wide either, but the footwork has made this a cuttable ball, past the left hand of the diving backward point fielder
shortish, close to off stump, hurries through and Kohli pulls along the ground to long-on
long-hop to start, but it slows down off the track and Kohli drags a pull from wide outside off to deep midwicket
length ball on middle, and he guides this from near his body with the bat's open face to point. They jog across for one
full on off, and guided off the front foot to third man for a single

slider on middle, and Kohli pulls along the ground to deep midwicket. Kohli completes the single quickly, but pushes Dhawan for the second. Sharp throw from Jhye Richardson and it's a direct hit! But Kohli's dive saves him. That was closer than he would've liked. Big roar from the crowd
length ball on middle, and he opens his stance to flat-bat a pulled shot to long-on
length ball on middle, and skidding in. Worked off the back foot to midwicket, but they can't pinch the run
wide, shortish slower ball, reaches out and slaps towards third man
on the pads, nearly chips it to the man at midwicket
low full-toss outside off, driven to long-off
wow. Full outside off and Kohli steps across once again and frees his arms through a hard, flat hit straight back over the umpire's head - not that far over - and run away to the boundary in a flash
finishes with a full ball outside off, Kohli reaches across to steer towards point. That over has ignited India's innings, and indeed India's tour.
Sammy keeps it tight on off stump, Kohli stays put and plays it back.
similar ball, not there for the drive and Kohli defends back to the bowler.
fuller and a touch wider outside off, Kohli opens the blade and plays it into the covers for a single.

Kohli goes, and it is a moment for the cameramen. Slower ball from Sammy, full and enticing the early drive. Kohli fell for it, getting forward and looking to play across a little early, and he got a big leading edge. It ballooned up between point and cover, and both went for it. Not much calling, as Samuels and Hyatt converged. Almost a collision, but Hyatt holds the ball while Samuels holds Hyatt. And then they argue over who should have taken it!
loud appeal for lbw! But this was probably going down the leg side.. Dharmsena shows no interest.. Good delivery that one

and what a strike first ball! The big ripping legbreak has got the huge wicket! Sodhi pitched on a perfect length around off stump, drawing Kohli forward into a cover drive away from his body, the ball gripped the pitch and turned furiously, grazing the outside edge before nestling in Ronchi's gloves. New Zealand on the charge
incredible fielding, Nathan McCullum sprinted to his left from long off and returned a rocket throw to keep Kohli's fluent inside-out drive to just a single
a low dipping full toss on middle stump, Kohli moves forward and across to hit it along the ground to wide long on, Guptill fumbles but he has back up
driven off the back foot to the fielder at cover
strays down leg side, Elliott is very lucky that Kohli missed the glance to the fine leg boundary
Kohli moves outside leg, Elliott follows him, Kohli flicks off the pads through square leg
Kohli moves forward and across and flicks solidly off his pads through square leg
a lovely square drive off the front foot, using the bowler's pace to hit the length ball in front of point
low full-toss wide of off stump, great hands from Kohli to play a sliced drive into the gap between backward point and sweeper cover. Sharp running too to pick up two
good length and fast outside off, Kohli is beaten as he tries to steer to third man
he over-steps first up and concedes a free hit! Kohli defended this one - good length around off - on the off side. big no-ball

short ball, pulled to midwicket where he is caught, but he can't be out because it is a free hit, the throw comes back to Milne, who did really well to get back to the stumps but he dropped the ball before breaking the stumps, or else Dhoni would have been out
Kohli moves forward and flicks towards wide mid-on, his timing is so good that the fielder has to hurry and slide
moves forward and towards the off to tuck the ball through midwicket
tries to drive a full ball too hard and mis-times to cover, Elliott is taking all the pace off the ball
a fullish ball on off stump, Kohli moves forward and plays to midwicket
full and straight, Kohli stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
too full and too straight and Kohli gets going with a neat clip off the pads between midwicket and mid-on. Spectacular timing. Spectacular first over from Finn, who's been impressive on this tour.
good length around off stump, Kohli pushes forward and blocks
exceptional length and line on this pitch, giving the batsman noting around off stump, Kohli has to defend once again
played towards midwicket where the fielder swoops on the ball
Kohli breaks the streak of nine dot balls by opening the face and steering the ball towards third man

down the track, Cummins tries to bowl a slower ball out of his reach, well outside off, but doesn't quite succeed. He only allows Kohli to free his arms, and he does so gleefully to launch a crisp hit over the long-off boundary
slower bouncer, gets up to head height over off stump. Kohli shapes to hook and has to adjust to the lack of pace. Helps it along the ground through wide mid-on
driven into the covers off the front foot

oh Afghanistan, another drop, Kohli looks to hammer that one over wide long-on, he doesn't get enough distance on it, the fielder is there, should have got in position to take that one much earlier, but Sami can only push it over the rope as he is unbalanced when the ball arrives, should have taken that one, Kohli is not a man you want to give an extra chance to, not when he is in this form
pitched up and that is eased to long-on
finally a good over for Australia. He refuses to give Kohli any room and the full ball is pushed to long-on. Just the five runs off that over
late-cuts this short ball, but can't get it past point
bowls a long hop, and has been pulled to deep midwicket
that's good pace. Short of a length, 142ks, getting to to bounce towards the chest, hits the top of the bat
Kohli steps out and hits the length ball through the line to long off
Kohli slices a full ball high over cover, Duminy comes running in and doesn't catch it ball. It would not have been out but Duminy is having a poor fielding day
the short ball is far down leg side, Kohli tries to pull but the ball is too far away
full and straight again, Kohli drives from his crease past the bowler for a single
a good length ball stops on Kohli a touch, he chips it in the air towards mid-on and to the fielder at long on
a full toss on off and middle, Kohli makes room and drives towards extra cover, the fielder at cover dives to his right to cut it off
good length round off and middle, Kohli punches towards long on for a single
nudged into the leg side for a single
flat and fast, played towards point for one
over long off this time, Kohli drives the ball flat and hard, sends the ball racing towards Behardien who leaps to try and catch the ball, but it is just high enough to clear him
Kohli his time! Moves forward, clears his front leg, and slams the ball high towards deep midwicket, once again he clears de Lange by a whisker to bring up 1000 T20 international runs
fires the ball wide outside off stump
a full ball on leg stump from round the wicket, driven to deep midwicket for a single
a flat ball darted into the pads, Kohli pushes the ball through midwicket
good length, cramping Rohit for room as he comes forward, he manages to push the ball between midwicket and mid-on

pace has done him in. This is one of the rare instances in recent times that Kohli has been done in comprehensively by a bowler. It's the pace and bounce again. Short, close to 143ks, his weight didn't go back as he pulled, and ended up skying it towards mid-off. Christian had to run to to his right, and put a slide in to complete the catch
really wide outside leg stump, even AB de Villiers can't collect cleanly
Kohli turns the strike over immediately with a drive to long on
pitches outside off stump and cuts in, Kohli stays in his crease and dabs the ball down to third man
the short of a length ball rises on Kohli outside off and he adjusts well to the bounce to steer the ball behind point
Morris under a lot of pressure now. He bowls a short of a length ball on the pads and Kohli moves inside the line and glances to the long leg boundary

he's cleared the fielder on the long on boundary! Only just though. Kohli moves on to the front foot and lofts Morris through the line, it is de Lange on the boundary and he's pretty tall, but the ball just clears him. Consecutive sixes off Morris.
steps out to take the ball on the full to drive towards long on
driven on the front foot towards wide long off
a length ball on the pads, Kohli glances through square for a single
he begins with a huge wide outside off stump
Kohli on the charge now, gets a wide length ball, drives it inside-out, past the desperate diving hand at extra cover
push-driven wide of mid-off for one
dabbed away to third man for one
short of a length, into the pads, worked away for an easy single
flatter, punched into the leg side
Kohli is down the wicket, seems like he is half-beaten in the flight, but he manages to place the lifted drive over extra cover for four
short of a length, cut away, Faulkner misfields at point to allow a single
Kohli throws his bat at a shortish ball outside off, but is beaten. Doesn't quite get close to its line
short of a length, no room, pushed to mid-on
short of a length, on off, opens the face to third man for one
short and wide, he is on his toes as he cuts this away to third man
tucked away off the hip, fine of long leg, Faulkner runs around and puts a dive in to keep them down to two
another wide down the leg side. Short of a length, looks to tuck him up, but slides too far
full outswinger at 147KS, defended from the crease
short of a length, 151ks again, but provides Kohli that slightest bit of width. He has square-driven this on the up. Between point and cover-point
line goes wrong again. Wide down the leg side
short of a length, 151ks, no room, defended from the crease
short of a length, outside off, steered to third man for one
Kohli aims to hit down the ground but the ball connects with the bottom of his bat and goes towards deep square leg

that's a big moment in the match. Bravo cramps Kohli for room with a short ball on middle from wide of the crease, the decision to play the pull was probably right, but this one got big on him to get the glove as Fletcher completed an excellent catch down leg side. Kohli didn't even wait for the umpire to raise his finger
slower delivery alright, but too short as Kohli opens the bat face late to dab it past short third man. Superb timing, even better placement
nurdled towards where a midwicket would be as they scamper across for a run
this time, there's tremendous power. Stays inside the crease which makes the delivery all the more shorter, and thumps it over mid-off. Clean strike that.
not in the best of positions as he shapes to pull that short delivery on middle. The ball was drifting in, Kohli didn't have much control
flatter one outside off, pushed to cover
doesn't take long for him to get off the mark. Just a hint of width, Kohli opens up those steely wrists so beautifully to find the gap between cover and point to send the ball screaming off the bat
flat delivery on middle and leg, defended towards midwicket

full-toss on middle and off, worked away towards deep midwicket, and he's run out first ball! He walks off cursing himself (or maybe Rohit - not sure who called for the second run). Throw came in nice and flat and AB had the bails off in a flash, with Kohli a good foot out. Yup. It was Rohit who called. Kohli didn't run the first run all that quick. Morris was the fielder. He had to run a fair distance towards his left.
Duminy's taken it cleanly! Kohli pulled but did not have room to free his arms against the short ball. It flew flat to Duminy and he caught it at head height
and he really can't do anything wrong. A decent delivery, short of a length, outside off, and he has punched it to the right of third man for four
short of a length, on the pads, worked away for one
pulled away, wide of mid-on, but Hogg makes a diving save. Australia on with their fielding game
full, on the pads, flicked away, Hogg makes another diving save, but can't prevent the single
short of a length, middle and leg, worked away for one
slower and fuller outside off, worked to wide mid-on for an easy single
good length outside off, Kohli opens the face as the ball shapes away from him and steers towards third man. That was 146 kph
a speedy full toss outside off stump, Kohli's attempt at a punch through cover takes the inside edge and goes towards short fine leg, there's another small mix-up between the batsmen but no harm done
opens the face to steer the ball towards third man
slower delivery and he clips him down to deep midwicket
