Dropped! Umar Akmal this time and it would have been a sharp catch at backward point, Kohli sliced it off the front foot and Akmal flung himself to his left and hung on but the ball slipped out when his elbow hit the turf
gets forward and drives him down to long-on
tossed up outside off and he drives through the line to long-off
clips it against the turn to square leg
comes round the wicket, Kohli fails to pull a short delivery, looked like it skidded through
how do you stop a man in form? Classic cut by Kohli, Ajmal didn't give him room but he managed to slice it past the diving short third man, should have got a hand to it though
clips it wide of square leg and hurries his partner for a couple and that's his fifty!
he eases it down to long-on
stays back and h tucks it wide of square leg
pauses before delivery, he clips it to midwicket
flat! Kohli gives the best spinner in the world the charge and smashes it flat and quick and lands just over the long-on rope
another ordinary effort in the field, Kohli deliberately dabs it down to third man, Hasan sprinted across at third man, got a hand to it but it rebounded to the rope
comes forward and drives down the ground to long-off
clips it in front of the pads and milks another single, India doing this easily
flatter delivery and clipped down to deep midwicket
Dropped, Nazir this time, Kohli pulls the short one and it doesn't get much distance, Nazir ran forward from deep midwicket and didn't time his dive well
Kohli is perhaps aware of the NRR scenario, shows his intent by giving the charge and lofting it elegantly over extra cover
opens the face of the bat and angles it down to third man, two more to the total
Free Hit Kohli rubbing it in here, friendly half volley outside off and driven past the covers, the sweeper gives up the chase
Gul oversteps! Full on the pads and he drives through the line down to wide long-on, India closing in on the NRR gap
Kohli gives the charge and turns it behind him but straight to short fine leg
down the track and he can only hit it to the fielder at midwicket
tucked away to short fine leg again, India haven;t managed to get there within 16.4
tossed up on the pads and he clips it to deep square leg for a single, scores level
Kohli starts with an outstanding cover drive, leaning forward to punch the length ball through the gap in the in field. The fielder at cover took some pace off the ball before it got through
short of a length outside off, Kohli stays back and plays towards backward point
quicker and flatter and he slices it straight to short third man
down the wicket to drive this length ball to long-off for one
lovely text book cover drive! Pushes a half volley outside off and Jamshed should have done better sweeping at the boundary
good length just outside off, defended from the crease on the off side
bowls another quicker one and he drives to cover
shorter delivery and he slaps it to point
not very convincing, there was turn and bounce and he hung his bat out and edged it to third man
comes to the pitch of the ball and drives him to wide long-off, already the fielder's pushed back
gets some late swing and lands it full, Kohli managed to get his bat down just in time, turned the face of the bat
wristy flick to the leg side for a quick single, one of his most recognisable shots
gives him a bit of width and he slices it wide of point
nearly sneaked through! Quick and flat and it hit Kohli's back pad, outside the line of the stumps
goes back and drives him straight to cover
beaten! Spins away and skids through, nearly takes the outside edge
stays back and punches it down the track
misfielded by the bowler, really should have stopped that
nice running, punched towards mid-off and he's a bit deep, he was off the crease quickly
drives a low full toss down to long-off
stays on the back foot and punches it to mid-off
slower through the air and he tucks it against the turn to square leg
the off break skids through and hits his pads as he tries to pull it away
bowls it straight and flat, Kohli was on the back foot early and made enough room to slice that wide of the diving cover fielder
clips it with the turn to the on side for a single
Afridi nearly gets that googly to skid through and hit the stumps! Kohli just about managed to block it
gets across and he pushes it down to mid-off
Kohli makes a statement now! Tossed up and he chips down the track and lofts him clean and effortless over long-off
flatter delivery and he places it to the off side
slower through the air and he rocks back and slaps it to deep cover
Ajmal is take off, Hasan fires that flat outside off and he chops it to the sweeper
tossed up outside off and driven firmly wide of long-off, not risking the second
drives him down to long-off
quicker one and he stays at the crease and punches it down the track
where's the slip Mr Hafeez? Kohli was down the track for the big one, Afridi flighted it and the thick outside edge beat the keeper and down to third man
tosses it up quicker and he clips it to the on side
Kohli tries to blast the ball square on the off side but misses
not in control of the pull from head high, but it doesn't go up in the air. Gets a single to long leg
stays back to a length ball, the cut goes straight to point
slower short ball, tucked away off the hip for one

recovers well again. Kohli jumps at Boland who seems to have done him in with a wider slower ball, but Kohli's awareness is great. He scoops this square over point for four. Both point and third man are up in the circle
nearly a yorker, low full toss, mis-hit towards deep midwicket, and because this has gone just past the 30-yard circle at midwicket, they come back for an easy second
slower ball, dragged towards deep midwicket, under pressure to keep them down to one, Maxwell misfields running in from deep midwicket. Easy couple
good welcome from Finn. Short of a length, on middle and off, seaming away a touch, and Kohli is right behind it
can this man do anything wrong? He has just defended a peach, but as soon as he gets width on alength ball, he drives it between cover and cover-point. Seems he could do it in his sleep
Kohli is on. Definitely on. Short of a length, outside off, and he has punched it away square for a four
gets a much easier ball this time, a half-volley, but finds short extra cover with it
good come back from Broad. Short of a length, outside off, seaming away, Kohli follows it, and is beaten
slightly fuller, slightly slower, steered away to third man
short of a length, just outside off, defended to cover
nice bounce from just short of a length, rising towards the chest, Kohli stands tall, opens the face, gets a single
Kohli charges down, and doesn't care what is bowled at him. Bresnan bowls short, gets it chest high, but Kohli still upper-cuts it over point
length ball, wide outside off, Kohli doesn't move his feet, but times it well still. However, he has found the cover with this one
dabbed away square of third man, but not square enough to come back for two
Slips don't matter when you are in this form. Finn gives him a half-volley outside off, and he wristily drives it between Finn and mid-on
short of a length, just outside off, pushed to cover-point
short of a length, into the pads, worked away to deep square
short of a length, on the stumps, nicely guided to third man
full, fast, on the pad, worked away for a single
short of a length, on of,f doesn't turn, and Kohli does well to get an inside edge onto the pad
down the track, right down to the pitch, works it away for one
full, on off, driven to long-on for one
full, outside off, driven to sweeper-cover
it seemed Broad had done him in by following a backing-away Kohli, but he still manages to whip it over midwicket. One of these days, Kohli will actually mistime a shot
a massive grunt from Kohli as he misses out on a short and a wide delivery. No feet there
short of a length, outside off, steered away to third man
sharp turn, from short of a length and just outside off. For once, Kohli is cramped, and can't get it away
too short, pulled away to deep midwicket
short of a length, outside off, drives it in the air towards deep point. Kohli slips at the non-striker's end, which is why they get just the one. Faulkner gives Kohli a hand
slower bouncer down the leg side, Kohli has hit what would have been a wide for a single to long leg. Faulkner does his job. Only eight off that over

nicely bowled by Tye but what an incredible shot from Kohli to bring up his fifty. He is down the wicket, Tye nearly yorks him up, but Kohli has crunched this past extra cover for four. All along the ground, scorching the turf at it goes
Kohli is down the wicket, is almost done in by a high full toss. Dhoni turns back aggressively, Watson fumbles under pressure at long-off
swept away from middle and leg for a single to long leg
low full toss, down the wicket, drives it to long-on for a single
slower ball, middle and leg, pushed to long-on for one
short of a length, lovely batting, as he places this wide of long-on with soft hands. Comes back for the second easily
full, middle and leg, no room, flicked to short midwicket again
pushes forward and then rocks back to punch it between long-off and deep cover. Boland is looking for a relay throw as he dives and fields but Marsh has over-run him so that allows them a third
flat and outside off, Kohli gets back and hits it wide of extra cover
short of length ball angling in towards the body, nudged towards midwicket

Kohli is one of the best when it comes to hitting towards extra cover, he shows that again here, he charges out and lofts that over extra cover, doesn't bother keeping it down, the fielder at long-off races to his left but can't get near the ball
a full toss and Shapoor gets away with it, Kohli edges it towards midwicket, Kohli swings his bat in frustration at missing out on that one
flighted and full again, this time on middle and leg stump, pushed towards mid-on
full ball is worked to long-on for one more
Kohli gets to his fifty, as he seems to in virtually every match these days, it was a high full toss that was slammed down the ground

Afghanistan have held on to the the catch this time! Kohli looks to launch that one over long-off, seemed to have hit it quite well, but it doesn't have the legs, long-off latches on to it, it's Nabi who take a terrific overhead catch, and immediately signals to the crowd in celebration, huge wicket that, it was a
fullish, turning into the pads, helped away for one - just four off the over
full, middle and leg, no room, flicked to short midwicket
Kohli is down the wicket again, and drives this over point for two more. India well on course here
short, into the body, with the short leg-side boundary, paddled away past short fine leg for two
Kohli picks the slower ball early, dances down the track and wallops the length ball over long-on for six. Doesn't even look up to see where it has gone
Kohli has found the gap superbly as he flicks this full ball between mid-on and midwicket
yorker, middle and leg, punched to midwicket
short of a length, offcutter, beats Kohli's drive
that is unlucky. Short slower offcutter, but it turns too much from outside off to be called a wide down leg
and nearly a run-out. Sharma-Kohli misunderstanding goes on. Kohli has dabbed this to short third, but he doesn't instinctively trust his partner's call. He runs late and has to dive to make it in
oh boy what is Kohli on? He has just come in and is middling everything. Down the wicket to drive this on the up, and between mid-off and extra cover
short of a length, worked to leg for one
does he need sighters anymore? He has punched this right off the middle of the bat first up. What timing. Flies towards mid-on

how can a team display such good awareness one ball and then not even try the second run next ball? Raina was happy to sacrifice his wicket on the fifth ball of the over, but on the last ball - and this is a criticism of perhaps every team in the world - batsmen don't risk hurting their average. This is hit to Maxwell at long-on again, Maxwell has had to collect it with his left hand, but India are happy with just the one. The red ink against the sure is ensured

Tye has missed an easy run-out. Hit straight to long-on, and Raina sacrifices his wicket to give Kohli the strike. Maxwell's throw is accurate, Raina is miles away but Tye messes up the collection and gives them the extra run
length ball, hit straight to long-off for one
shorter, flatter, punched wide of long-off, and they come back for an easy second

Read this two or three times to believe this. Off the front foot, he has pulled a short-of-a-length delivery into the cow corner. He didn't even go back to create the pulling length. That's a shot and a half
steers this one down to third man for one
slower full, too full, driven to long-on for one
Kohli down the wicket, beaten by a slower ball, but he manages to chip it over extra cover for two. Has recovered well again
full toss on the pads with the fine leg inside the circle. Tait denies Richardson the death wish by diving and making a save at short fine leg
slower ball, on a length, middle and leg, played with soft hands to long-on. Comes back for the second
nearly a yorker, dug out to extra cover. They decide against the single
rapid short ball, pulled to long-on for one
yorker this time, dug out for one
and Kohli picks on the short square boundary. This is a small six, a parallel six. Picks it up off the toes. A length ball really. Uses all the pace of Tait to flick it over square leg
driven to deep cover for one
another superb shot. This is a length ball, around off, and Kohli has wristed it wide of long-on. Again there is a small gap between long-on and cow corner, but he has found it
makes room to drive this full ball all along the carpet for a four. To the right of extra cover and to the left of long-off. That is a small gap. Really small gap. Kohli has pierced it
lovely slower bouncer, Kohli's hook is beaten, but he is not happy with the call to not wide it. Again touch and go as it was in the last over. Wided last over, fine this time
short of a length, slower ball, runs it to short third
slower length ball, pushed past point for one
full toss outside off, Kohli has left the crease, which means he gets too close to it. Sends this back to Richardson
yorker, on off, dug out for one to deep cover
full and low, pushed towards long-on with soft hands. Rushes back for the second, brings up the fifty. Kohli's golden run continues
short of a length, wide, and Kohli plays a superb back-foot drive over cover for four. Really powerful
full outside off, driven to long-off for one
short of a length, Kohli is done in a little after having left this crease, but he recovers well t run this legcutter fine of short third leg
short, into the hip, punched away to long leg
half-volley, on the pads, driven towards deep midwicket
this legbreak doesn't turn, hits the inside half of the bat and goes back to Boyce
a better cleaner hit, along the ground to long-off for one
Kohli is not quite to pitch f this legbreak, he has not got this clean out of the screws, but he has backed his bat to send this over long-off. It just about evades that fielder
worked towards deep midwicket, and Raina steals the second. Seems Warner's throw has come to the wrong end, Raina's. It is Kohli who is a little slow in setting off for the second
not to the pitch of the ball after jumping out of the crease, drives hard still, but Head makes a one-handed save to his left
length ball, on the pads, worked to deep midwicket for one
short of a length, outside off, no turn, punched powerfully past extra cover for four
down the wicket, too close to the pitch of the ball, hits it hard but doesn't get any elevation. A single to long-off
down the wicket, beaten in the flight, manages to play a drive to deep cover
this is even shorter, lets Kohli rocks back and cuts it past point for four
Kohli yorks himself by stepping out of the crease. Extra cover fields
length ball on the pads, flicked away to deep square for one
short of a length, slower ball, but too straight with fine leg inside the circle. Kohli just deflects this square of that short fine leg
charges down, yorks himself, but steers it to the right of third man, and comes back for two
more lovely bowling. This is the quicker one, the toppie, outside off, and beats Kohli's drive

the pressure from Swann has finally drawn a false shot. Kohli gets too close to this delivery, and goes towards midwicket. Because he is so close to the pitch of the ball, he doesn't get the elevation, and picks out deep midwicket
on a length, on off, punched to long-on for one
Tye might have thought for a moment he has done Kohli in with a wide full ball as Kohli makes room, but he has reached out and steered it past point for four
low full toss, hit to long-on for one
short of a length, hit straight to short straight cover

another run-out between Kohli and Sharma. Low full toss hit towards deep midwicket. Sharma runs back for the second, Kohli doesn't. Easy run-out for Australia. For Sharma it was always two, but Kohli had his hand up right away. Kohli seems to have slipped on the turn, and hence raised his hand in a no
slower bouncer, he has pulled this to long-on for one
yorker, doesn't even go off the pitch, but Sharma steals the single
lovely placement again. Kohli jumps out of the crease, doesn't time this shot well, but he has gone over extra cover again, and gets four for it
good wide yorker, dug out for a single to extra cover
slower bouncer that follows Kohli as he backs away and beats him. A rare dot ball then

that is a mis-hit that has cleared long-off comfortably. A mix of the short straight boundary and quality of bats. Kohli has withdrawn from the stumps and toe-ended this length ball for a six over long-off
yorker, on the pads, goes off the front edge for one
down the wicket and away from the stumps, Boland follows him with a really full delivery. Kohli has no room and manages just the single to long-on
good bouncer, middle and leg, Kohli is ducking and belatedly looks to ramp it. Beaten
wide length ball. Doesn't matter if it is a slower ball, Kohli has reached it and sent it flying over extra cover. Too much room there
gets the upper cut right this time. Hastings bowls the quick short ball again, but this is a gentler pace. Kohli s ashes it over point
quicker short ball this time, Kohli looks to play the powerful upper cut, but the extra bouncer beats him
driven straight to extra cover and Finch fumbles to allow them a single
good ball, but Kohli has played it just as well. Short ball that follows him and cramps him up totally, but Kohli still manages to guide it towards third man. Fine of third man actually
slower ball, 120ks, driven on the up, straight to short extra cover
on a length, outside off, looks to drive this to long-off, but can't place it wide enough of Tye
and Kohli looks in good touch right away. Clips it away off the toes
full toss, on the pads, hit wide of long-on for a couple. Kohli ends with a superlative 90
full, into the pads, drilled away to deep midwicket for one
down the wicket, yorks himself, hits this hard at Richardson, and takes a single off the ricochet. Could have gone for the second but decides against it. Thirteen to go to the hundred
slower short ball but again too far down the leg side. Deflected past short fine leg for two
yorker, dug out to long-on, and because it has gone off pace towards the fielder they steal the second. Had Richardson been behind the stumps he could have run Raina out
down the wicket, is beaten by the slower ball, but he is in such confident mood he recovers and goes ahead with the shot and still manages to chip this over extra cover
good length angling into the right-hander from just outside off, no room in length or line for Kohli to use, he presses forward and pushes into the leg side
